1b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad dulo ka prAdz+nyA ba te/ bod skad du//
1b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten bzhag pa/ bamapo dang po// // thams cad
1b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / / sdom la/ ri rnams
2a1(mdo sde): bya/ / dang ni rgya mtsho dang // ngan song rnams dang gling dang shing // klu rgyal
2a2(mdo sde): dang ni mkha' lding dang / / rgyal chen 'gro dang 'dun sa rnams// 'di skad bdag gis
2a3(mdo sde): thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
2a4(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra be na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge
2b1(mdo sde): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'jig rten gyi khams ni gsum po 'di dag yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong spyi phud kyi
2b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so//
2b3(mdo sde): stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ ji tsam du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma rnam par snang ba rnams kun tu 'khor zhing
2b4(mdo sde): phyogs snang bar byed pa'i bar yin te/ zla ba stong dang / nyi ma stong dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang / shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang /
2b5(mdo sde): 'dzam bu gling stong dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams stong dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
3a1(mdo sde): pa stong dang / 'thab bral ba stong dang / dga' ldan stong dang / 'phrul dga' stong dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong dang / tshangs
3a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten stong ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o// stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/
3a3(mdo sde): stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen
3a4(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
3a5(mdo sde): gyi khams zhes bya'o/ / dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shar phyogs su mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig
3a6(mdo sde): pa 'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas la/ gzhan 'chags shing
3b1(mdo sde): gzhan chags par gnas so/ / dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa
3b2(mdo sde): 'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas te/ gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas so// dge slong dag dper na
3b3(mdo sde): bar snang las char pa'i 'bru shing rta'i srog shing tsam 'bab ste/ chu'i rgyun rnams rab tu 'bab pa na mtshams sam bar chad med pa de bzhin du/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las
3b4(mdo sde): 'das pas/ shar phyogs su de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am chags par gnas
3b5(mdo sde): te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas/ gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
3b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rnams mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am/ chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas la
3b7(mdo sde): gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas pa de dag kyang mthong ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang gi nang du gshegs so// de'i tshe na rtse
4a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang
4a2(mdo sde): ldan pa dag ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bstan pa dang / ji ltar shing rta'i srog shing gi dpes bstan pa 'di legs te ngo mtshar to// de la stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na
4a3(mdo sde): ri chen po nyis stong yod de/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang / khor yug gi ri stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na rgya mtsho chen po nyis stong yod de/ nang gi rgya mtsho chen po stong dang /
4a4(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen po stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ngan song gsum stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba stong dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas stong rnams so// /
4a5(mdo sde): stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling chen po bzhi stong yod de/ shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang / 'dzam bu gling stong dang / nub kyi ba glang spyod stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong rnams
4a6(mdo sde): so/ stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ shing chen po bzhi stong yod de/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i shing 'dzam bu stong dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram na shal ma ri'i mthon po stong dang / lha ma yin
4a7(mdo sde): gyi ris kyi cing tra pa ta li stong dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i sa brtol stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ klu'i rigs bzhi stong yod de/ klu'i rigs sgong las skye ba stong
4b1(mdo sde): dang / mngal nas skye ba stong dang / drod gsher las skye ba stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong
4b2(mdo sde): yod de/ nam mkha' lding gi rigs sgo nga las skye ba stong dang / mngal nas skye ba stong dang / drod gsher las skye ba stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig
4b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi stong yod de/ yul 'khor srung stong dang / 'phags skyes po stong dang / mig mi bzang stong dang / rnam thos sras kyi bu stong rnams so//
4b4(mdo sde): stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'gro ba lnga po lnga stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba stong dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha dang / mi'i 'gro ba stong
4b5(mdo sde): rnams so/ / stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dun sa chen po nyis stong yod de/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang stong dang / lha ma yin gyi 'dun sa nor bzang zhes bya ba stong
4b6(mdo sde): rnams so/ / 'jig rter bzhag pa las tshigs dang po'o// // sdom la/ skye gnas ri dang rol mtsho dang / de bzhin sems can dmyal brgyad gzhan// sems can
4b7(mdo sde): gnas dgu rab bshad de/ / las lam bcu po de bzhin no// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dod pa'i skye gnas gsum yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ sems can
5a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa rnams la/ dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ mi kha cig dang lha rnams so//
5a2(mdo sde): 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas dang po'o// sems can 'dod pa sprul pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'phrul dga'i
5a3(mdo sde): lha rnams so/ / 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyi sprul pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa
5a4(mdo sde): dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas gsum pa'o// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bde ba'i skye gnas gsum yod de
5a5(mdo sde): sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas rlan par byed cing / yongs su rlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par
5a6(mdo sde): byed pa dag yod do/ / de dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byas shing / yongs su brlan par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas shing
5a7(mdo sde): yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg par gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha
5b1(mdo sde): rnams so/ / 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas dang po'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas rlan par byed cing / yongs su rlan
5b2(mdo sde): par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byed cing
5b3(mdo sde): yongs su brlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byas shing / yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing
5b4(mdo sde): yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams so// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bde bas rlan par byed
5b5(mdo sde): cing / yongs su rlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bde ba brlan par byas shing /
5b6(mdo sde): yongs su brlan par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas shing / yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe
5b7(mdo sde): ring zhing yun ring du gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas gsum pa'o// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gser gyi ri chen po bdun
6a1(mdo sde): stong yod de/ ri'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzin stong dang / gshol mnga' 'dzin stong dang / seng ldeng can stong dang / bltan sdug stong dang / rta na 'dzin stong
6a2(mdo sde): dang / mu khyud 'dzin stong dang / ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rol mtsho chen po bdun stong yod de/ gnyang shing 'dzin gyi rol mtsho
6a3(mdo sde): stong dang / gshol mda' 'dzin gyi stong dang / seng ldeng can gyi stong dang / blta na sdug gi stong dang / rta rna ri'i stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin gyi stong dang / rnam par 'dud kyi rol mtsho stong
6a4(mdo sde): rnams so/ / stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos stong dang / thig nag stong dang / bsdus
6a5(mdo sde): gzhom stong dang / ngu 'bod stong dang / ngu 'bong chen po stong dang / tsha ba stong dang / rab tu tsha ba stong dang / sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi
6a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gyi gnas dgu stong yod de/ sems can gzugs yod pa lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rnams dang lha kha cig/
6a7(mdo sde): go// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dang po'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus tha dad la 'du shes gcig pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha dang po byung ba gang yin pa de
6b1(mdo sde): ngag go/ / 'di ni sems can gyi gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig la 'du shes tha dad pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams so// 'di ni sems
6b2(mdo sde): can gyi gnas gsum pa'o/ / sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig cing 'du shes gcig pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas bzhi
6b3(mdo sde): pa'o/ / sems can gzugs yod pa 'du shes med cing 'du shes dang bral ba dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas lnga pa'o// 'di ni
6b4(mdo sde): sems can gyi gzugs med pa rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams
6b5(mdo sde): yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du
6b6(mdo sde): skyes pa'i lha rnams so/ / 'di ni sems can gyi gnas drug pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes
6b7(mdo sde): mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnams so// 'di ni sems
7a1(mdo sde): can gyi gnas bdun pa'o/ / sems can gzugs med pa gang dag rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do/
7a2(mdo sde): snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas brgyad
7a3(mdo sde): pa'o/ / sems can gzugs med pa rnams thams cad ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag yod
7a4(mdo sde): de'adi lta ste/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dgu pa'o// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mi dge ba bcu'i
7a5(mdo sde): las kyi las ngag yod de re ba gso byi len 'dod pa log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal pa dang
7a6(mdo sde): brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / lag par lta ba rnams sa// sreg gcod pa shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas pas ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar
7a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de bas shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rang tul bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches
7b1(mdo sde): yang bas ni du 'bod chen por ra/ / de bas ches shas chung ba dang / dengs ches yang bas ni du 'bong du'o// debs ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni bsdus gzhos du'o// de/
7b2(mdo sde): bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni thig nag tu'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyur ro//
7b3(mdo sde): ma byin par len pa shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du bya ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal
7b4(mdo sde): pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan rang du byas pa ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro//
7b5(mdo sde): de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rab tu tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas chas yang bas ni tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches
7b6(mdo sde): yang bas ni ngu 'bod chen por ro/ / de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'bod du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni bsdus gzhom du'o//
7b7(mdo sde): de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas chas yang bas ni thig nag tu'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyur ro//
8a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gzhag pa las tshigs gnyis pa'o// // sdom la/ mkha' lding las lam bcu po dang // myong ba dang ni bkres dang zas// bdud rtsi'i
8a2(mdo sde): phyis char pa dang / / mu ge bde dang bcu tshan no// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ klu'i rigs bzhi stong rgya mtsho chen po na gnas so// nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong shing shal
8a3(mdo sde): ma la'i mthon po la gnas te/ sgo nga las skyes pa stong dang / mngal nas skyes pa stong dang / drod gsher las skyes pa stong dang / rdzus te skyes pa stong rnams so// nam mkha' lding
8a4(mdo sde): sgo nga las skyes pa ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga la skye ba 'byin par byed de/ mngal nas skye ba ma yin/ drod gsher las skye ba ma yin/ rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci ste
8a5(mdo sde): de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / nam mkha' lding mngal nas skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba 'byin par byed de/ drod ga
8a6(mdo sde): las skye ba ma yin/ rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci ste de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding drod gsher las skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/
8a7(mdo sde): klu sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dag 'byin par byed de/ drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci ste de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par
8b1(mdo sde): / 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam ma khaN+Da l+r-ing rgyus te skye ba ni brna' ba'i phyir/ klu sgang las smye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzas te skye ba 'byin par byed do// 3/
8b2(mdo sde): laklu chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa dag yod do// de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal pi rtag na la dang / klu'i rgya
8b3(mdo sde): po btang bzung dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang / klu'i rgyal po nag yi chen po chen po che dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab rnams te/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang kra
8b4(mdo sde): chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa nam mkha' lding dag gis dbyung bar mi nus pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed cing so sor myong bar byed de/ shes shing
8b5(mdo sde): rab tu shes la kun tu rab tu shes so/ / ji skad du shin tu mthu che ba'i kla dag yod de/ mtha' bsrung zhing chun gnas te/ de dag lha ma yin dag dang g.yul 'gyed pas/ 'di dag brgya byin gyi ni
8b6(mdo sde): dngu yang yin/ / stobs kyang me zhing mthu ma klu yin te// shin tu drag po dgra thabs sna tshogs can// lha min rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed pas// de dag brgya byin gyi ni gsul yang na
8b7(mdo sde): zhes kyang bya'o/ / bar gyi sdom la/ dga' bo nye dga' rtag rgal dang // btang bzung dang ni gzi byin dang // yul 'khor srung dang nag po che// e la'i 'dab ma phyi ma yin// sdong
9a1(mdo sde): spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag yod de/ srog gcod pa spong ba dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /
9a2(mdo sde): brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal pa spong ba dang / brnab sems med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba rnams so// srog gcod pa spong
9a3(mdo sde): ba shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas pas ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang
9a4(mdo sde): bas ni 'phrul dga' rnams su'o/ / de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni dga' ldan pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'thab bral ba
9a5(mdo sde): rnams su'o/ / de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas mi sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams
9a6(mdo sde): su'o/ / de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang
9a7(mdo sde): brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal pa spong ba dang / chags sems med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba shas cher kun tu bsten cing
9b1(mdo sde): bsgoms te lan mang du byas pas ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'phrul dga' rnams/
9b2(mdo sde): su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni dga' ldan rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'thab bral ba rnams su'o// de bas ches
9b3(mdo sde): shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba
9b4(mdo sde): dang / de bas ches yang bas ni mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// ci ste mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ba na yang / srog gcod pa spong bas ni tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par
9b5(mdo sde): len pa spong bas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro/ / 'dod pa log par g.yem pa spong bas ni chung ma dang 'gran zla med par 'gyur ro// brdzun du smra ba spong bas ni skur pa mang bar mi 'gyur ro// phra ma
9b6(mdo sde): spong bas mdza' bo dang dbye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / tshig rtsub po spong bas ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par mi 'gyur ro// tshig 'khyal pa spong bas ni tshig mnyan par 'gyur ro// chags sems med
9b7(mdo sde): pas ni 'dod chags che bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gnod sems med pas ni zhe sdang che bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag par lta bas ni gti mug che bar mi 'gyur ro// bar sdom ni/ skur pa med
10a1(mdo sde): dang mdza' mi dbye/ / de bzhin yid du 'ong ba thos// nyan pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ba ste// yig bzhi ni brjod pa yin// sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang
10a2(mdo sde): na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por tshe'i tshad bskal par len pa 'di mchog yin no// dud 'gro myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las kyi rnam
10a3(mdo sde): par smin pas/ sa srungs kyi bus sa srungs kyi bu nyid dang / rab tu brtan pas rab tu brtan pa nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// yi dgas kyi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni
10a4(mdo sde): las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rgyal po gshin rje gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa 'di mchog yin no// mi'i skye gnas myong bar 'gyur
10a5(mdo sde): ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ nga las nu nga las nu nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las
10a6(mdo sde): gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa 'di mchog yin no// sum cu rtsa gsum pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi
10a7(mdo sde): rnam par smin pas/ brgya byin gyis brgya byin nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// 'thab bral myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rab 'thab bral gyis rab
10b1(mdo sde): 'thab bral nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no/ / dga' ldan myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas dga' ldan gyis yongs su dga' ldan nyid thob pa 'di mchog
10b2(mdo sde): yin no/ / 'phrul dga' thob pa'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rab sprul gyis rab sprul nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni mchog yin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
10b3(mdo sde): myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ dbang byed kyis dbang byed myong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni mchog yin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la bkres pa
10b4(mdo sde): dang skom pa yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams dang / sum cu rtsa
10b5(mdo sde): gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// de yan chad la na
10b6(mdo sde): bkres pa dang skom pa med do/ / ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la kha zas 'di lta ste/ 'bras chan dang / zan dang / phye dang / sha dang / 'khur ba rnams yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus
10b7(mdo sde): 'phags po dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa la yang yod do/ / byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ni dri'i zas dang
11a1(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i zas za'o/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul
11a2(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// de yan chad la ni kham gyi zas med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i bdud rtsi ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang
11a3(mdo sde): dkar po rnams so/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
11a4(mdo sde): byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ / tshangs ris pa rnams la ni meng do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la yang bshang ba dang gci ba yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus
11a5(mdo sde): 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i
11a6(mdo sde): gling gi mi rnams la ni/ char 'bab mkhas pa dang / char 'bab mi mkhas pa yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang
11a7(mdo sde): gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams lo legs pa dang mu ge yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi
11b1(mdo sde): lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar
11b2(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la ni 'jigs pa dang bde ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la ni
11b3(mdo sde): med do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa
11b4(mdo sde): rnams la yang yod do/ / tshangs ris pa rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs gsum pa'o// // sdom la/ nyo tsheng mdog dang khang
11b5(mdo sde): pa dang / / gding ba dang ni bzhag gos dang // yang ba rdul rab bsgre ba dang // tha dad bag ma len dang bcu// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la/ nor ram/ 'bru 'am/ gser ram/ dngul
11b6(mdo sde): gyi nyo tshong bya ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra ma snyan gyi mi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni med
11b7(mdo sde): do/ / de yan chad la yang med do// 'di skad du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la ni/ nor dang 'bru rnams kyis nyo tshong byed do// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams la ni ras dang be'u ras rnams kyis so//
12a1(mdo sde): nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyis ni ba lang dang nor bu rnams kyis so zhes zer ba yang yod do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi mdog nag po dang / dkar po dang / sngo bsangs
12a2(mdo sde): dang / mdog sgyu snar rnam pa bzhi yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni mdog gcig pa ste dkar ro//
12a3(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi mdog ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab
12a4(mdo sde): bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phral dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi mdog gcig pa ste dkar po'o// tshangs ris pa rnams
12a5(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad
12a6(mdo sde): med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba
12a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched
12b1(mdo sde): pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa rnams la ni kha dog med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi khang pa tshang du byas pa dang / ched du byas pa ma yin pa dang / khang bzang dang a khang
12b2(mdo sde): rnams yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi khang pa ni ched du byas pa ma yin pa'i sa khang ngo // rgyal chen
12b3(mdo sde): bzhi pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang ni ched du byas pa dang / ched du byas pa ma yin pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral ba rnams dang dga' ldan
12b4(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams ni ched du byas pa ma yin pa'o// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ji lta
12b5(mdo sde): ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad
12b6(mdo sde): med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya
12b7(mdo sde): nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang pa yang ched du ma byas pa yin no// gzugs med pa rnams la ni khang pa yang med do// ji ltar
13a1(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la gding ba dang / bgo ba 'di lta ste/ bal gos dang / sha na'i ras dang / gso ras dang / zar ma'i ras dang / sa gos dang pa dang dang
13a2(mdo sde): ko tam pa'i ras dang / rtswa du ku la'i gos dang / a ba ran ti'i ka'i gos dang / ras dang / be'u ras yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang
13a3(mdo sde): yod do/ / byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gos gyon no// ji ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos gyon pa bzhin du rgyal
13a4(mdo sde): chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang
13a5(mdo sde): bzhin no/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams gos gyon bzhin du skye'o// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od
13a6(mdo sde): chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang
13a7(mdo sde): bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang
13b1(mdo sde): gos gyon bzhin du skye'o/ / byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyi shing rnams ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po rnams so//
13b2(mdo sde): bzhag gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po
13b3(mdo sde): dang dmar po dang / dkar po rnams te/ dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu skyes pa 'am/ bud med dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de la yal ga 'dud
13b4(mdo sde): par byed do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyi shing rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// bzhag
13b5(mdo sde): gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang /
13b6(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po rnams te/ dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu yal ga 'dud par byed do// de'i lag tu 'ong
13b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan
14a1(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni/ dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling
14a2(mdo sde): gi mi rnams la yang gding ba dang / bgo ba lci ba dang / yang ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod de/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag
14a3(mdo sde): bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos la ni srang gcig yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ni srang phyed do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ni srang gi bzhi cha gcig go/ 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni srang
14a4(mdo sde): brgyad cha gcig go/ dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni srang gi bcu drug cha gcig go/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni srang gi sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi cha gcig go/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi
14a5(mdo sde): shing las byung ba'i gos ni srang gi drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha gcig yod do/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi ni gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa mdun na 'don rnams
14a6(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med
14a7(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min
14b1(mdo sde): gyi lha rnams kyi yang gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no/ / nyi zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul phra rab yin no// rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go// rdul phra mo bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul
14b2(mdo sde): gcig go/ nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul gcig go/ ri bong gi rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go/ lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go/ glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go/ sro ma bdun
14b3(mdo sde): la ni a ba ga na gcig go/ / a ba ga na bdun la ni ba tig gcig go// ba tig bdun la ni nas 'bru gcig go// nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go// sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la ni khru gang ngo // 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnam
14b4(mdo sde): ni kha cig ni khru tshad de ltar brtsis pa'i khru phyed dang bzhi pa'o/ / kha cig ni khru bzhi pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams ni khru brgyad pa'o// nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams ni khru bcu drug go/ byang gi sgra mi snyan pa
14b5(mdo sde): rnams ni khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi lus thob pa ni rgyang grags kyi cha bzhi cha gcig go// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags phyed do// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni rgyang gras
14b6(mdo sde): kyi bzhi cha gsum pa'o/ / dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig go/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig dang rgyang grags pa'i cha'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags phyed dang
14b7(mdo sde): gnyis so/ / tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad byed do// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad phyed dang gcig go// tshangs pa chen po pa rnams kyi ni dpag chad phyed dang gnyis so// 'od chung ba rnams kyi/
15a1(mdo sde): ni dpag tshad gnyis so// tshad med 'od pa rnams kyi dpag tshad bzhi pa'o// 'od gsal ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgyad do// dge chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bcu drug go// tshad med dge
15a2(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ / dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi'o// sprin med pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// bsod nams skyes pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad nyi
15a3(mdo sde): brgya lnga bcu'o/ / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o// 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o// mi che ba'i lha'i lus thob pa ni dpag tshad stong ngo // mi gdung ba rnams kyi ni
15a4(mdo sde): dpag tshad nyis stong ngo / / gya com snang ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi stong ngo // shin tu mthong ba po rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo // 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lus thob pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad khri drug stong ngo //
15a5(mdo sde): / gzugs med pa'i lha rnams la ni bsags pa'i lus med do// nyi zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul phra rab yin no// rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go/ rdul phra mo bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul
15a6(mdo sde): gcig go/ nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul gcig go// ri bong gi rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go/ lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go/ glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go// sro ma bdun la ni a pa
15a7(mdo sde): gan gcig go/ / a ba ga na bdun la ni ba ti ka gcig go/ ba ti ka bdun la ni nas 'bru gcig go/ nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go// sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la khru gang ngo // 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kha cig ni gro/
15b1(mdo sde): khru tshad 'di lta bur brtsis pa'i khru brgyad pa kon no// kha cig ni khru bcu pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams kyi ni khru'i shu pa'o// nub kyi ba lang spod kyi ni khru bzhi bcu'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni dpag
15b2(mdo sde): bsams shing las byung ba'i gos khru brgyad cu pa gyon no/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyang lus la ci ran pa'i gos gyon no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba
15b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams
15b4(mdo sde): dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang // bsod//
15b5(mdo sde): nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyi yang de
15b6(mdo sde): bzhin no/ / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la dbang po tha dad de/ kha cig la ni pho'i dbang po yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi snga
15b7(mdo sde): mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhipa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
16a1(mdo sde): byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mo'i dbang po yang med/ pho'i dbang po yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdunar
16a2(mdo sde): 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas
16a3(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba
16a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la bag ma gtong ba dang / bag ma len pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang skyed
16a5(mdo sde): pa rnams la yang yod do/ / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul
16a6(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni bag ma gtong ba yang med/ bag ma len pa yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin
16a7(mdo sde): du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams
16b1(mdo sde): dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba ba rnams dang / yin
16b2(mdo sde): tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs bzhi pa'o// sdom la/ grang dang dus tshigs mtshan mo dang // pha ma dang ni
16b3(mdo sde): khol dang / / nor dang 'bru dang mngon par zhen// bcu tshan yongs su brjod pa yin// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la shin tu grang ba dang / shin tu tsha ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po
16b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la yang med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi
16b5(mdo sde): rnams la dus tshigs 'di lta ste/ dgun dang / dpyid dang / dbyar dang / ston yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnam
16b6(mdo sde): dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnam
16b7(mdo sde): la yang yod do/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni dus tshigs med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung
17a1(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang /
17a2(mdo sde): bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams
17a3(mdo sde): yang de bzhin no/ / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mtshan mo dang nyin mo yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang skyed pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang /
17a4(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod
17a5(mdo sde): do/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mtshan mo med/ nyin mo yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams
17a6(mdo sde): dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang
17a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu
17b1(mdo sde): gling gi mi rnams la pha dang ma yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lnga rnams dang / sum cu
17b2(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod de// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la
17b3(mdo sde): nim yang med/ pha yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba
17b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras pa
17b5(mdo sde): che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi'i
17b6(mdo sde): rnams la rje bo dang bran yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams la ni rje bo yang med/ zaran yang med
17b7(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni rje bo dang bran yang yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phral
18a1(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni rje bo yang med/ bran yang med do// tshangs ras pa rnams ji ltang ban
18a2(mdo sde): du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dkar
18a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nem snang ba pa rnams
18a4(mdo sde): dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ nor dang 'bru yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi
18a5(mdo sde): lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do/ / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni 'bru ni yod la nor ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni nor ni yod la 'bru ni med do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin
18a6(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni nar
18a7(mdo sde): yang med/ 'bru yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba
18b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang
18b2(mdo sde): gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la/ pha 'am/ ma 'am/ bu pho 'am/ bu mo
18b3(mdo sde): 'am/ rje bo 'am/ bran nam/ nor ram/ 'bru la mngon par zhen pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams
18b4(mdo sde): la ni ci yang zhen pa med do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni/ 'bru ma gtogs pa gzhan rnams la mngon par zhen pa yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams
18b5(mdo sde): dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni ci la yang mngon par zhen pa med
18b6(mdo sde): do/ / tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang /
18b7(mdo sde): dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba
19a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten bzhag pa tshigs lnga pa'o//
19a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten bzhag pa bam po gnyis pa/ sdom la/ zla mtshan 'khrig dang khu chu dang // tshe bsgyur dang ni chu klung brag/ sA la rdzi du glang po dang // srungs ma 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lam// ji ltar
19a3(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ bud med zla mtshan can dang / sbrum ma dang / bu btsa' ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spong ba rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa
19a4(mdo sde): la yang yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi ni/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'u dang / bu mo lo lnga lon pa ji tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo phrag pa 'ar/ pang par sems can dus
19a5(mdo sde): skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du/ 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am/ bu mo'o snyam du sems so// khye'u dang bu mo de dag kyang 'dis mar 'di ni bdag cag gi ma 'am/ pha'o
19a6(mdo sde): snyam du sems so/ / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni lo drug lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni lo bdun lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// ngag po rgyad lon pa ji
19a7(mdo sde): ba bzhin no/ / 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni lo dgu lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'u dang / bu mo lo bcu len 'jams pa dang cin du
19b1(mdo sde): lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo phrag pa 'am/ phang par sems can rdzus te skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am/ bu mo'o snyam du sems so// khye'u dang / bu ma
19b2(mdo sde): de dag kyang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag cag gi ma 'am/ pha'o snyam du sems so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni thog ma nas lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rdzogs par skye zhing / 'chi ba na de kho na
19b3(mdo sde): bzhin no/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang
19b4(mdo sde): dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rna
19b5(mdo sde): dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// gzugs med pa rnams la ni/ lus kyi gzugs med de/ de bas na de bzhin skye ba yang mi
19b6(mdo sde): mngon/ 'chi 'pho ba yang mi mngon no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos ston pa na gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnam
19b7(mdo sde): dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lho rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams ni 'khyud pa tsam gyis gdung
20a1(mdo sde): ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lag pa nas bzung ba tsam gyis so// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyis ni bgad pa tsam gyis so// gzhan 'phrul dbang med pa rnams kyi nang lhas
20a2(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / tshangs ris pa rnams la ni 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'ong
20a3(mdo sde): chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes
20a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lnga rnams kyang de ba zhin no//
20a5(mdo sde): ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la/ khu chu mi gtsang ba 'byung ba yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang sprod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i ma rnams la yang
20a6(mdo sde): de bzhin no/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi ni rlung 'byung ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang /
20a7(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'dir
20b1(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams
20b2(mdo sde): dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams
20b3(mdo sde): dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
20b4(mdo sde): skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de ni/ yi dgas rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig ste/ nyin
20b5(mdo sde): zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ yi dgas rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na ni lo khri lnga
20b6(mdo sde): stong yod do/ / shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor
20b7(mdo sde): 'chi ba ni yod do/ / byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba med do// ci'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la bar ma dor 'chi ba med ce na/ de dag la bdag gi ba med
21a1(mdo sde): cing / yongs su 'dzin pa med de/ tshe nges shing khyad par du 'gro ba yin pas/ de'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la/ bar mdor 'chi ba med do// 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la ni yar skye ba dang /
21a2(mdo sde): mar 'grib pa yod de/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams res 'ga' ni tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi tshe lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag
21a3(mdo sde): gcig yin no/ / nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod
21a4(mdo sde): do/ / de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag dgu yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba
21a5(mdo sde): chen po yang sos kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag 'bum drug khri nyis
21a6(mdo sde): stong yod do/ / mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
21a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang sa ya phrag drug yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen
21b1(mdo sde): po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig go/ / nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dpal
21b2(mdo sde): ba'i lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang / bye ba phrag dgu khri drug stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de ni/ 'thab bral gyi
21b3(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo nyis
21b4(mdo sde): stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang / sa ya phrag bzhi yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom gyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu
21b5(mdo sde): la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom gyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo nyis stong
21b6(mdo sde): ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gcig dang / bye ba phrag sum 'bum drug khri brgyad stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin pa de ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin
21b7(mdo sde): zhag gcig go/ / nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnam kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod de//
22a1(mdo sde): de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / bye ba phrag gsum dang / sa ya phrag drug yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi nyin zhag gcig go//
22a2(mdo sde): nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal
22a3(mdo sde): ba'i lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag brgya dang / bye ba phrag sa ya gnyis dang / bye ba phrag dgu 'bum bzhi khri bzhi stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo brgyad
22a4(mdo sde): brgya gang yin pa de ni/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo
22a5(mdo sde): de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo brgyad stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de ma'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag nyis brgya sum cu dang / lo sa ya phrag bzhi yod do// de ni sems can dmyal chen po ngu 'bod chen
22a6(mdo sde): po'i nyin zhag gcig go/ / nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i
22a7(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i lo brgyad stong yod de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa drug dang / bye ba phrag sa ya gsum dang / bye ba phrag lnga 'bum lnga khri nyis stong
22b1(mdo sde): yod do/ / mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin no// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/
22b2(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsas na lo bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /
22b3(mdo sde): lo sa ya phrag drug yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po
22b4(mdo sde): tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na
22b5(mdo sde): lo bye ba phrag lnga brgya dang / lo bye ba phrag sum cu dang / lo bye ba phrags ya brgyad dang / bzhi 'bum dang / lo bye ba phrag khri drug stong yod do// / bar gyi sdom la/ dgu dang gsum
22b6(mdo sde): dang bcu bzhi dang ni lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / / nyis brgya dgu brgya rnams ni mi yi grangs kyis lha tsher bshad// de bzhin gcig dang bcu gnyis gcig dang brgya dang drug cu dang // lnga brgya dag ni sems can
22b7(mdo sde): dmyal ba pa yi tsher bshad de/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa'i phyed de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal
23a1(mdo sde): pa'i byed de/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can
23a2(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa chen po pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa phyed dang gnyis te/ bar mdo
23a3(mdo sde): 'chi ba ni yod do/ / 'od chung ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gnyis te/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni
23a4(mdo sde): yod do/ / 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bcu drug ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni
23a5(mdo sde): yod do/ / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge rgyus kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste/
23a6(mdo sde): bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/ bar ma dor 'tsha ba ni yod do// bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal
23a7(mdo sde): pa nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams
23b1(mdo sde): kyang de dang 'dra'o/ / mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa nyis stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi
23b2(mdo sde): ba ni yod do/ / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad stong ste/
23b3(mdo sde): bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa
23b4(mdo sde): nyi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa'i
23b5(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa drug khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad khri ste/ bar ma
23b6(mdo sde): dor 'chi ba ni yod do/ / 'di nas byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod do// ri nag po gsum po dag gi byang phyogs na ri nag po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gsum po de dag gi byang phyogs na yang
23b7(mdo sde): ri nag po gzhan gsum yod do/ / ri nag po gzhan gsum po yod pa de dag gi byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba yod do// ri'i rgyal po gangs kyi byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang
24a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod do/ / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang nas dpag tshad bcu'i tshu rol na mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ ma thos pa zhes kyang bya'o// mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba de la
24a2(mdo sde): chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du ni dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang la me
24a3(mdo sde): tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos kun tu khebs par 'dug go/ de'i nang nas klung chen po bzhi 'di lta ste/ gang+gA dang / sin du dang / si ta dang / paka shu dang / 'di
24a4(mdo sde): rnams 'bab ste/ gang+gA ni shar phyogs nas glang po che'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por
24a5(mdo sde): 'gro'o/ / sin du ni lho phyogs nas khyu mchog gi kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o//
24a6(mdo sde): paka shu ni nub phyogs nas rta'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs su rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// si ta ni byang phyogs
24a7(mdo sde): nas seng ge'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor te/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// 'di skad du/ byang phyogs kha dgur 'gyur
24b1(mdo sde): ba yidachu mtsho yod de gzhan dag kyang / / des na mtsho chen chu zhes bya// tha dad rgyun rnams 'byung gnas yod// chu klung gang+gA sin du pag shu dang // si ta dba' rlabs dbu ba'i 'phreng ba can// 'bab cing
24b2(mdo sde): thams cad bsil ba'i chu yin te/ / chus gang khyad par bzhi 'bab ste// phyogs bzhi kho ra khor yug dag nas 'byung // gang+gA shar phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba ste// sin du lho phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba'o//
24b3(mdo sde): pag shu yang ni nub phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro// de yi byang phyogs rgya mtshor sid 'gro// chu klung rab mches na po 'ari dag ni mchog tu bza' zhing so sor 'bab pa ste// re re zhing yang lnga brgya khyer nas ni//
24b4(mdo sde): chu yi rgyun rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'gro// zhes kyang bya'o// raM spos kyi dang ldang de'i bya dang kAgs kyi drug tu skyabs lha ma yin gyi ngos zhes bya ba yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zhang
24b5(mdo sde): du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ dpang du dpag tshad phyang da bzhi med pa dbyar shing balnga ni sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ de'i nang gi sa gzhi yang dbyibs leg
24b6(mdo sde): shing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa gser gyi phye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chu'i chag chag btab pa ste/ der yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams
24b7(mdo sde): kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro/ / de'i khor ra khor yug tu gser gyi brag bya skyibs brgyad stong yod de/ de thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ de dag gi nang gis
25a1(mdo sde): gzhi rnams kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa la/ mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba shing ngam/ gseg
25a2(mdo sde): ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs
25a3(mdo sde): shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing dang / gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/
25a4(mdo sde): de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ shing sA la'i rgyal po chen po rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba sA la'i 'phreng
25a5(mdo sde): ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba zhig yod de/ sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de'i rtsa ba ni/ 'dom bcu bzhi thur du zug go/ sa la'i 'phreng ba dang po'i rtsa ba na 'dom bcu gsum thur du zug go// gnyis
25a6(mdo sde): pa'i ni bcu gnyis so/ / gsum pa'i ni bcu gcig go// bzhi pa'i ni bcu'o// lnga pa'i ni dgu'o// drug pa'i ni brgyad do// sA la'i 'phreng ba bdun pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dom bdun thur du zug go/ sA la'i
25a7(mdo sde): rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag rnams gang yin pa de ni/ sA la'i 'phreng ba dang po la thug go// 'phreng ba dang po'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag gang yin pa de ni
25b1(mdo sde): gnyis pa la'o/ / gnyis pa'i gang yin pa de ni gsum pa la'o// gsum pa'i gang yin pa de ni bzhi pa la'o// bzhi pa'i gang yin pa de ni lnga pa la'o// lnga pa'i gang yin pa de ni drug pa la'o// drug
25b2(mdo sde): pa'i gang yin pa de ni bdun pa la'o/ / sA la'i 'phreng ba bdun pa'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag gang yin pa des ni nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go// de'i nang gi sa gzhi yang dbyibs
25b3(mdo sde): legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/
25b4(mdo sde): der mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/
25b5(mdo sde): der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i shar
25b6(mdo sde): phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu ste/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na
25b7(mdo sde): sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ba/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs pa zhig yod de/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang gi pad+ma'i
26a1(mdo sde): lo ma rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ ba lang yog pa tsam mo// pad+ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gshol mda' tsam mo// pad+ma'i me tog
26a2(mdo sde): rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam mo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po'i brla tsam mo// ro mngar zhing mchog tu mang te/
26a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba bzhin no// bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go/ rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi kho ra khor yug na/ rdzing bu brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs
26a4(mdo sde): shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsil zhing sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ngo // de dag gi nang gi pad+mo'i lo ma rnams kyang che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ ba lang g.yog pa tsam mo// pad+ma'i sdong bu
26a5(mdo sde): / rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gshol mda' tsam mo// pad+ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i 'phang lo lnga tsam mo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu
26a6(mdo sde): / che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po'i brla tsam mo// ro mngar zhing mchog tu mngar te/ 'di lta ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba bzhin no// bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go// de'i lam srid du dpag
26a7(mdo sde): tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ der yang yid du mi
26b1(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis/ rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul
26b2(mdo sde): ngor spyod pa rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod do/ / me tog ku mu da'i mdog ltar thal kar 'dug pa/ yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/
26b3(mdo sde): de'i mgo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags 'dam bu chu/ shel gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i
26b4(mdo sde): srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad bdun yod do// de'i 'khor glang po che brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams
26b5(mdo sde): cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ me tog ku mu da'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug cing / yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/ de dag gi mgo yang dbyibs legs shing blta/
26b6(mdo sde): na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags 'dam bu chu/ shel gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar ba mche ba drug yod pa sha stag ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de 'khor dang bcas pa/ dgun zla ba bzhi
26b7(mdo sde): ni brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'khod do/ / dpyid zla bzhi ni shing sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa brag
27a1(mdo sde): bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'dug pa'i tshe ni/ glang po che brgyad stong po rnams 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes pa
27a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ brag bya skyibs brgyad stong dag gi nang na nye bar gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang nas/ shing sA la'i rgyal po rab tu
27a3(mdo sde): brtan pa'i nang na 'gro na/ re 'ga' ni tha mal pa'i tshul gyis 'gro/ res 'ga' ni 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing / mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas
27a4(mdo sde): glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi mgo 'am rgyab tu zhon te/ sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu
27a5(mdo sde): brtan pa shing sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i tshe ni/ glang po che brgyad stong po de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang
27a6(mdo sde): mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ shing sA la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun po dag gi nang na kha nang du bltas shing 'khod do// shing sA la'i 'phreng ba dang po'i nang na 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du bltas
27a7(mdo sde): shing 'khod do/ / gnyis pa'i nang na 'dug pa'i gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// gsum pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang la nang du lta'o// bzhi pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa
27b1(mdo sde): de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o/ / lnga pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// drug pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// bdun pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin
27b2(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang kha nang du bltas te 'khod do/ / gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa shing sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa nas/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab par 'gro ba na/ res 'ga' na tha mal
27b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis 'gro'o/ / res 'ga' ni 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang //
27b4(mdo sde): che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi mgo bo 'am/ rgyab tu zhon te/ sil snyan dang / phag rdob pa dag kyang rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa rdzing bu dal gyis
27b5(mdo sde): 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa/ de'i tshe glang po che brgyad stong po dag 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes par
27b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi mtha' khor khor yug kun nas bskor te/ kha nang du bltas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang na rtse zhing
27b7(mdo sde): dga' la dga' dgur spyad nas/ phyir 'byung ba de'i tshe de'i nang na glang po che dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang na zhugs nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams blangs te shin tu bkrus shing rab tu
28a1(mdo sde): ba shal nas/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa la 'bul/ gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa zos shing 'thungs te/ 'grangs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ glang po che gzhan
28a2(mdo sde): brgyad stong po de dag kyang rdzing bu re rer zhugs nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ pad+ma'i rtsa bdag blangs shing shin tu bkrus shing rab tu bshal te za'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang
28a3(mdo sde): po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad pa rab tu brtan pa'i mthu ni de tsam mo/ / sems can thams cad ni srungs ma dang bcas shing srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang mi 'bral te/ sems can gang dbang chung bar
28a4(mdo sde): grags shing bsod nams chung la/ gzi brjid chung ba de dag ni/ brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig bsrung ste/ dper na ba lang mang po dang / lug brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po
28a5(mdo sde): la gcig gis bsrung ba de bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang chung bar grags shing / bsod nams chung la/ gzi brjid chung ba de dag ni brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig bsrung ngo // sems
28a6(mdo sde): can dbang che bar grags shing / bsod nams che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag ni brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu bsrung ba ste/ dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am/ de bzhin
28a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu bsrung ba de bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang che bar grags shing / bsod
28b1(mdo sde): nams che la gzi brjid che ba de dag la brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu bsrung ngo // 'dir smras pa/ ci ste sems can thams cad srungs ma dang bcas/ srung ba dang / skyong
28b2(mdo sde): pa dang / sbed pa dang mi 'bral na ci'i phyir 'tshe ba yod par 'gyur/ smras pa/ srungs ma mthu chung ba zhig yin na ni/ de la zil gyis gnon pa las 'tshe ba yod do// srungs ma bag med cing bag med
28b3(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa zhig yin na/ de'i bag med pa'i rgyu las kyang 'tshe ba rnams yod do// srungs ma gnyis lhan cig 'thun par gyur pas kyang zil gyis mnan nas 'tshe bar byed do// mi rnams chos ma
28b4(mdo sde): yin pa la spyod cing mi rigs pa spyod pa yin na/ de dag ni de dag gi chos ma yin pa spyod pa dang / mi rigs pa spyod pa las kyang 'tshe ba yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma 'di lta
28b5(mdo sde): ste lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba
28b6(mdo sde): 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams su bkod pa dag yod de/ zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gi g.yog zho shas
28b7(mdo sde): 'tsho ba rnams kyis lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams
29a1(mdo sde): dang btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / bsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te
29a2(mdo sde): ci ste de dag gis skyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do/ / ci ste de dag gis skyen par ma tshor na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni/ rgyal po chen po
29a3(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag gi bu rnams kyis lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram
29a4(mdo sde): pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ ci ste
29a5(mdo sde): de dag gis skyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas rnams mthon po la 'god do/ / ci ste de dag gis skyen par ma tshor na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bco lnga la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi
29a6(mdo sde): po de dag nyid kyis lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang
29a7(mdo sde): btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ ci ste de dag gis sbyin par tshor na na
