29b1(mdo sde): de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do/ / ci ste de dag gis skyen par ma tshor na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la
29b2(mdo sde): ni rgyal po chen po dag gi g.yog zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs
29b3(mdo sde): kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa
29b4(mdo sde): dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi chos
29b5(mdo sde): bcu bzhi la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi bu rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs
29b6(mdo sde): la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams
29b7(mdo sde): dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad du nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bco lnga la ni rgyal po chen po
30a1(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag nyid ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs lar
30a2(mdo sde): mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams byed pa dang / gso
30a3(mdo sde): spyo la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad du nyul lo// ci ste mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang /
30a4(mdo sde): phar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mor mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams
30a5(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang
30a6(mdo sde): dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa dag mang na ni/ rgyal po bzhi po rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs su 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'di shes
30a7(mdo sde): par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin par 'jig rten na mar mi 'dzin pa dang / phar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mor mi byed pa
30b1(mdo sde): dang don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing / bsod nams
30b2(mdo sde): dag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes bsnyad do// de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yi ma rangs
30b3(mdo sde): shing mi mgu bar gyur nas/ yi ma rangs pa nyid kyang phyir ldog par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang / phar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong
30b4(mdo sde): mami 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la
30b5(mdo sde): kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi byed pa dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug pa mang ba
30b6(mdo sde): nimi rnams kyi chos mdzes pa yin no/ / rkyen du bab pa ma yin no// legs pa ma yin no// dge ba ma yin no// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams
30b7(mdo sde): kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes smos so/ / ci ste mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs
31a1(mdo sde): kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par
31a2(mdo sde): lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ba na ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis sum cu rtsa
31a3(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs su 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'di shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang
31a4(mdo sde): par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di
31a5(mdo sde): dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug
31a6(mdo sde): pa dag mang ngo zhes bsnyad na ni/ de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yi rengs shing mgu bar gyur nas/ yi rangs pa nyid kyang zlos par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi
31a7(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs
31b1(mdo sde): pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nges par gnas
31b2(mdo sde): pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas/ 'dug pa dag mang ba ni mi rnams kyi chos mdzes so// rkyen du bab bo// legs so// dge'o// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel
31b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro zhes smos so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i 'khor rab tu dga' la bde zhing yid bde ba skyes par
31b4(mdo sde): rig nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'dir ni zla ba phyed dang tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu
31b5(mdo sde): mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir/ / nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// dge slong dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang /
31b6(mdo sde): cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigasu bcad pa smras pa de ni nyes par smras pa yin
31b7(mdo sde): gyilegs par smras pa ma yin no/ / nyes par ston pa yin gyi/ legs par ston pa ma yin no// nyes par brjod pa yin gyi/ legs par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
32a1(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gaN+DI mug dang bcas pa ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang /
32a2(mdo sde): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol/ sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol lo zhes nga smra'o// de bas na des gang 'di skad
32a3(mdo sde): du 'di ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang / / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// @
32a4(mdo sde): 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur/ / zhes tshogs su bcad pa smras pa 'di nyes par spras pa yin gyi/ legs par smras pa ma yin no// nyes par ston pa yin gyi/ legs par ston pa ma yin no// nyes par
32a5(mdo sde): brjod pa yin gyi/ legs par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag dge slong gang dgra bcom pa yin zhing / gang zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su
32a6(mdo sde): thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang /
32a7(mdo sde): cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// ngaci 'drab de bzhin 'gyur// tshogs su bcad pa 'di smras na legs par spras pa yin/
32b1(mdo sde): nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par ston pa yin te/ nyes par ston pa ma yin no// legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong de ni
32b2(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde
32b3(mdo sde): ba rnams las yongs su grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongs su grol ba'o zhes nga smra ste/ de bas na des ni gang 'di skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / cho 'phrul
32b4(mdo sde): gyi ni zla phyed la'ang / / gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra na legs par smras pa yin te/
32b5(mdo sde): nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par ston pa yin te/ nyes par ston pa ma yin no// legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so// 'dzam bu gling gi kho ra khor yug na
32b6(mdo sde): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po lam dpag tshad gcig tu/ gser gyi bye ma bdal te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chus pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khyab bo// gang gi tshe 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung ba
32b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen por dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du na skam zhing med par 'gyur te/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang nas gling du 'gro ba de ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lam yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis
33a1(mdo sde): kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che brtag par 'dod pas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ glang po rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho
33a2(mdo sde): la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas/ khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do// dge slong dag gzhan yang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po che brtag par 'dod pas nyi ma shar
33a3(mdo sde): ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rta rin po che la zhon nas sa chen po rgya mtsho chen po la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas/ khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do zhes gsungs so//
33a4(mdo sde): spyi sdom la/ ri dang skye ba'i gnas dag dang // nam mkha' lding dang lo tshong dang // grang ba dag ni lnga par byas// dus tshogs kyang ni tha ma yin// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs drug pa'o//
33a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten bzhag pa bam po gsum pa// / sdom la/ srungs ma lha yi grong khyer bsrung dang rnam par rgyal// chos bzang rgyu ba'i lam dang 'obs dang skyed mos tshal// sa gzhi
33a6(mdo sde): dang ni yongs 'dus brtol glang chen rnams/ / lha ma yin rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra ba yin// lha'i grong khyer dang / lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gyi bar du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma rnam pa lnga
33a7(mdo sde): bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / lag na gzhong pa thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng ba thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / rtag tu myos
33b1(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams so// gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dpung gi tshogs yan
33b2(mdo sde): lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon no// go cha rnam pa bzhi gyon pa 'di lta ste/ gser las
33b3(mdo sde): byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa rnams dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas
33b4(mdo sde): pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi la 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams so// mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang /
33b5(mdo sde): mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ngo // lha ma yin de dag gi dpung gi tshogs
33b6(mdo sde): yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shi rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te/ go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul
33b7(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya khas byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos pa nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs te/ sum
34a1(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ba de dag/ chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas chun gnas pa'i
34a2(mdo sde): klu rnams kyang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te/
34a3(mdo sde): go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa mgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang
34a4(mdo sde): mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs te/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste klu rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham par gyur na ni/ klu rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub
34a5(mdo sde): cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ klu rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams
34a6(mdo sde): kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma dang po klu rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas ri'i rgyal po ra rib kyi bang rim
34a7(mdo sde): dang po gang na lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na lol go thags kyi lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas lag na mol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na gzhong thogs kyi lngam
34b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma gnyis gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas lha ma yin dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste srungs ma gnyis rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham
34b2(mdo sde): na ni srungs ma gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lha ma yin rnams
34b3(mdo sde): rgyal te/ srungs ma gnyis pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma gnyis lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/
34b4(mdo sde): rari'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po nas/ bang rim gnyis pa gang na 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs kyi lha
34b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma gsum po rnams lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste srungs ma gsum
34b6(mdo sde): po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srungs ma gsum po dag gis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong
34b7(mdo sde): khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma gsum po pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma gsum po rnams lha ma yin gyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/
35a1(mdo sde): pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gnyis pa nas/ bang rim gsum pa gang na rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing
35a2(mdo sde): 'gro'o/ / de nas rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma bzhi po rnams
35a3(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste srungs ma bzhi po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srungs ma bzhi po rnams kyis
35a4(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma
35a5(mdo sde): bzhi po rnams pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma bzhi po dag lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/
35a6(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gsum pa nas/ bang rim bzhi pa gang na rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i
35a7(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs pa'i lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma lnga po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma
35b1(mdo sde): yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ / der ci ste srungs ma lnga po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni srungs ma lnga po rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te
35b2(mdo sde): pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma lnga po rnams pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
35b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim bzhi pa nas/ steng gi gzhi gang
35b4(mdo sde): na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad
35b5(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / ko'u shi ka gang bdag cag srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi
35b6(mdo sde): gzhir rtses te/ mchis pa mkhyen par mdzod cig/ ko'u shi ka da ltar gang gi dus la bab par dgongs shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas/ sum cu rtsa
35b7(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams la spras pa/ grogs po dag gang srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po
36a1(mdo sde): ri rab kyi steng gi gzhir rtses te 'ongs pa shes par gyis shig/ grogs po dag da ltar gang gi dus la bab par soms shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis glang po che'i
36a2(mdo sde): rgyal po rab brtan la bsams so/ / de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi mtshan ma rtogs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang
36a3(mdo sde): ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan 'dzam bu gling nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song ngo // song nas mgo sum cu
36a4(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis mngon par sprul te/ mgo re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun
36a5(mdo sde): bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la sil snyan bdun bdun mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo de dag thams cad kyi nang na khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la lha'i dbang
36a6(mdo sde): po brgya byin zhon no/ / de las gzhan pa'i mgo bo lhag ma rnams la ni nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon no// de las gzhan pa'i glang po che rnams la ni/ de las gzhan pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa
36a7(mdo sde): rnams zhon no/ / de shin tu mgyogs te/ dper na 'jig pa'i rlung ngam/ chag pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi mdun du 'gro'o zhe'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa med do//
36b1(mdo sde): de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer gyi lho phyogs sgo nas byung ste/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du phyin nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang ste/
36b2(mdo sde): lha 'am/ lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'byor cing
36b3(mdo sde): ldan par gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // ji tsam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga'
36b4(mdo sde): la dga' dgur spyod pa de tsam du lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur la/ sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ de dag lus rtsub pa dang / sems rtsub pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la mngon par mos par gyur
36b5(mdo sde): nas dpung gi tsho gas yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon te/ dpung gi tshogs yan
36b6(mdo sde): lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las
36b7(mdo sde): byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos so// go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las
37a1(mdo sde): byas pa rnams pags nas/ mtshan cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs so// mtshan cha rnam pa bzhi ral gra
37a2(mdo sde): mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed de/ ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub
37a3(mdo sde): cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du
37a4(mdo sde): snyeg par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin snyeg pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/
37a5(mdo sde): lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing
37a6(mdo sde): rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams tha rnams kyi phyi bzhin snyeg par byed
37a7(mdo sde): na ni/ de ltar lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na yang lan gsum du 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir ldog
37b1(mdo sde): go lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ / ci ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham
37b2(mdo sde): par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas na ni/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go// lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag
37b3(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so/ / 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams ni lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang
37b4(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// ci ste lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma
37b5(mdo sde): yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin
37b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyeg par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par
37b7(mdo sde): 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lan gnyis su yang la rnams rgal lha rnams
38a1(mdo sde): kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go//
38a2(mdo sde): 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin du snyeg par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na/ yang lan gsum du
38a3(mdo sde): g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji ltar lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams
38a4(mdo sde): pham na ni lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du zhugs nas
38a5(mdo sde): sgo rnams bcad de/ lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du/ lha rnams
38a6(mdo sde): kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyis/ bdag cag gis ni der mi brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i
38a7(mdo sde): mthong ba 'jug go/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni/ lha ma yin rnams
38b1(mdo sde): kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir log go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi ba zhi s
38b2(mdo sde): nyeg par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/
38b3(mdo sde): lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs
38b4(mdo sde): par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du sgeg par byed na ni
38b5(mdo sde): der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du sgeg pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir ldog
38b6(mdo sde): ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// dge slong dag ci ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/
38b7(mdo sde): pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go// lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing
39a1(mdo sde): skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so/ / 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams ni/ lha'i grong khyer
39a2(mdo sde): na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge slong dag 'di ltar snga ma 'das
39a3(mdo sde): pa'i dus nas/ lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na/ lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis
39a4(mdo sde): phyogs par byas nas/ shing rnga lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du sgeg par byed na ni/ de ltar lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du
39a5(mdo sde): sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan
39a6(mdo sde): cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ / ci ste lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas nas/ pham par byas shing
39a7(mdo sde): rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin du snyeg par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di
39b1(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha
39b2(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do/ / ci ste lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par
39b3(mdo sde): byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go// lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs
39b4(mdo sde): shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so/ / 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi brdzi bzhin du/ lha rnams kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang
39b5(mdo sde): 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus na de lta bur
39b6(mdo sde): gyur to/ / 'di skad du/ gang tshe lha dang lha min lhan cig tu// gnyis ka 'dus shing g.yul ni 'gyed pa na// shing rta pa ni nyi zla mtshungs med de// lha yi shing rta pa yi mchog yin no// zhes kyang
39b7(mdo sde): bya'o/ / ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhi na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba chur dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/ mtha' skor
40a1(mdo sde): du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ gser gyi rabs bskor ro// ra ba'i 'phang du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gsum yod do// rab
40a2(mdo sde): de las rtsig skyabs rnam pa bzhi las byas pa yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// gyen du 'phang ba'i mda'
40a3(mdo sde): yab dang / thur du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang / zam pa rgyud ma rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so//
40a4(mdo sde): de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes te/ bris shing legs par bris pa/ tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi
40a5(mdo sde): 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par ces byed la/ me tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du khebs te/
40a6(mdo sde): rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi mthu stobs kyis// lha yi grong khyer dag na
40a7(mdo sde): rlung chen ldang / / me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed// me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ zhes kyang 'byung ngo // lha'i grong khyer de na sgo stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba yod de/
40b1(mdo sde): sgo gcig kyang 'phang du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod do// sgo re re la yang skar ma'i gzugs su byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang /
40b2(mdo sde): dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// zla ba phyed pa lta bur yongs su grub pa dang / ba lang gi mgo lta bu dang / me long rnams kyang gser
40b3(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yin no// sgo re re
40b4(mdo sde): la yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bsrung ba'i phyir dang / bskyab pa'i phyir dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir srungs ma go cha bgos shing mda' cha thogs pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do//
40b5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lam srang srid du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yod la/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal
40b6(mdo sde): zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ srang de'i glo g.yas g.yon na rdzing bu byas pa'i rdzing bu de dag gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel
40b7(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa yod de/ them skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang /
41a1(mdo sde): bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhes brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las
41a2(mdo sde): byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// bai DUR+Ya
41a3(mdo sde): ni shel las byas so/ / shel gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni bai DUR+Ya las byas te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa mdzes so// rdzing bu de dag kyang chu bsil zhing chu
41a4(mdo sde): sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs te/ de dag na chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang /
41a5(mdo sde): skad san pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gi nyen kor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes
41a6(mdo sde): dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa'am
41a7(mdo sde): me tog gi na rgyan legs par btus pa bzhin du ste/ thangal se sres pa'i byas tshogs sa san cing 'jabs pa ring mang yid du 'ong bdang / skang mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs
41b1(mdo sde): rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ / de dag gi nyen kor na dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dam
41b2(mdo sde): / po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos rnam pa bzhi yang de dag
41b3(mdo sde): bzhi'o/ / shing las byas pa'i gos rnam pa bzhi yang de dag bzhi'o// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing yod do// lha 'am/ lha'i bu
41b4(mdo sde): mo dag gis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang /
41b5(mdo sde): dab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang /
41b6(mdo sde): sbrang rtsi dang / spang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa
41b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / zam pa rnams dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs
42a1(mdo sde): kya rnas khazas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/
42a2(mdo sde): rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi nang na/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyes
42a3(mdo sde): brgya lnga bdu/ mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad phyed dang lngas gyen du 'phags so// khang bzangs
42a4(mdo sde): rnam par rgyal ba de'i rmang rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam
42a5(mdo sde): 'i them pa rnam pa bzhi bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par
42a6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i ka pa rnam pa bzhi btsugs pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams te/ gser gyi ka ba ni ka rten
42a7(mdo sde): dang / ka zhu dang / ze phul dang / gdung ma rnams dngul las bas pa'o// dngul gyi ni gser las byas pa'o// bai DUR+Ya'i ni shel las byas pa'o// shel gyi ni ka rten dang / ka zhu dang / bre phul dang /
42b1(mdo sde): gdung ma bai DUR+Ya las byas so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba de'i phya ma rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las
42b2(mdo sde): byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la phyam stobs dang ldan pa rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas
42b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la them skas rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag ni 'di lta ste/ gser las
42b4(mdo sde): byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhi brtsigs so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la lan ka na gser las byas pa dang
42b5(mdo sde): dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kun gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni dngul las byas so//
42b6(mdo sde): dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// bai DUR+Ya'i ni shel las byas so// shel gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni bai DUR+Ya las byas so// bar gyi sdom la/ nga
42b7(mdo sde): rten them pa ka ba dang / / phyam rten dang ni stobs ldan phyam// 'khor sa dang ni spang leb khang // ya phubs dag ni tha ma yin// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la ba gam brgya yod de/ ba gam re re la yang
43a1(mdo sde): @khang pa brtsegs pa bdun bdun yod do/ / khang pa brtsegs pa re re la gnas khang bdun bdun/ gnas khang re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun
43a2(mdo sde): bdun/ g.yog mo re re la yang sil snyan bdun bdun yod do// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i nang na rdzing bu byas pa yod de/ rdzing bu de la chung dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha'
43a3(mdo sde): skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod do/ / rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las
43a4(mdo sde): byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhir yang lan kan dag gis kun nas bskor te/ lan kan rnam pa bzhi dag gis snga ma bzhin du/ dbyibs
43a5(mdo sde): legs shing blta na sdug pa la mdzes pa/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs
43a6(mdo sde): skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nye 'khor na me tog gi shing dang /
43a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me
43b1(mdo sde): tog 'phrang rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad
43b2(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam
43b3(mdo sde): pa bzhi yod do/ / bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
43b4(mdo sde): dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang /
43b5(mdo sde): gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / skad snyan pa dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de bzhin du de
43b6(mdo sde): dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang /
43b7(mdo sde): khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mang pos bstan pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg
44a1(mdo sde): rdob pa dag gis sgra sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas
44a2(mdo sde): brtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar lho'i mtshams na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba
44a3(mdo sde): yod de/ chur dpag tshad sum brgya/ zheng du dpag tshad sum brgya/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad dgu brgya yod de/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad phyed dang bzhis 'phags so// lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang
44a4(mdo sde): gi sa gzhi dang / yang thog dang / dgab pa dang / spyi bsdus kyi gdung ma dang / yang thog gi rtse bzhi dang / phya ma gzungs dang / phya ma dgu po thams cad shel las byas pa la dbyibs legs shing
44a5(mdo sde): blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ lan kan gser las bas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi kun nas bskor te/ de la sgro dang / ya phubs
44a6(mdo sde): dang g+han da dang / yang thog gi rtse bzhi dang / lun dang / phyam dgu po re re la yang ka ba bcu drug bcu drug gis kun nas brten to// rgyu ba'i lam ni rim pa bdun yod de/ de'i dbus na bai DUR+Ya las byas
44a7(mdo sde): pa'i ka bzur brgyad pa gsal zhing 'phan med la/ rigs dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ skra'i rtse mo tsam gyis khang pa brtsegs pa'i spyi bsdus kyi rten la mi reg go// de'i 'og na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi
44b1(mdo sde): gser gyi khri bzang po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod de/ der sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod nas lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / chos
44b2(mdo sde): sems shing dpyod do/ / yongs su rtog par byed do// lha'i grong khyer na rgyu ba'i lam srid du dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/
44b3(mdo sde): gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ de'i glo g.yas g.yon nas me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes pa'i dbyibs legs
44b4(mdo sde): la yongs su 'grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog
44b5(mdo sde): gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad
44b6(mdo sde): snyan pa 'byin to/ / lha'i grong khyer 'obs bdun rami gyis kun nas bskor te/ 'obs de dag zabs dang / rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod de/ pha gu gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang
44b7(mdo sde): bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis brtsigs la/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su
45a1(mdo sde): khabs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa
45a2(mdo sde): 'byin to/ / 'obs de dag na chu skra dang / rgyu mo kun dang / gru sna tshogs rnams byas pa dag yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chu'i rtsed mo la rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// 'obs
45a3(mdo sde): de dag gi nyen kor na/ me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/
45a4(mdo sde): dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs
45a5(mdo sde): skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang
45a6(mdo sde): bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal
45a7(mdo sde): shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chung dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug
45b1(mdo sde): la mdzes pa/ gser gyi rabs kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod la/ ra ba de la rtsig skyabs gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang /
45b2(mdo sde): shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// gyen du 'phang ba dang / thur du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang / zam pa brgyud ma rnam pa bzhi yod do// gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang
45b3(mdo sde): bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin
45b4(mdo sde): tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag pa na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par shes byed la/ me tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo
45b5(mdo sde): nub tsam du yongs su khebs te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'thor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi rkyen gyis ni/
45b6(mdo sde): shing rta sna tshogs pa na rlung chen ldang // me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed// me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grem// zhes kyang bya'o// skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi nang na
45b7(mdo sde): rdzing bu zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de yang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya
46a1(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa bzhi yod de/ them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang /
46a2(mdo sde): dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya
46a3(mdo sde): las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ chu bsil ba dang / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang zhing / me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ chu
46a4(mdo sde): nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs kyang skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nyen kor na me tog gi
46a5(mdo sde): shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs pa yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog
46a6(mdo sde): 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang /
46a7(mdo sde): skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang /
46b1(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang /
46b2(mdo sde): rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rol mo'i chi byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ papi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / sgra snyan pa rnams 'byung
46b3(mdo sde): ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha dang / lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod
46b4(mdo sde): do/ yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i
46b5(mdo sde): bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
46b6(mdo sde): rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // de'i glo lam chur dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs
46b7(mdo sde): legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma 'dal zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod do// de'i glo g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yod
47a1(mdo sde): pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi
47a2(mdo sde): slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong
47a3(mdo sde): ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod
47a4(mdo sde): do/ bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
47a5(mdo sde): po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ / rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs pa wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / ha ba shang dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rgyan sna
47a6(mdo sde): tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta de dag gi
47a7(mdo sde): lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am/
47b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo rnams kyis bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu'i bzhon pa la zhon par 'gyur te/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du dong nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur
47b2(mdo sde): spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na/ rdzing bu sna tshogs zhes
47b3(mdo sde): bya ba dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
47b4(mdo sde): rnams skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe/ yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su
47b5(mdo sde): myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag
47b6(mdo sde): tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zhing du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa
47b7(mdo sde): dang bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser
48a1(mdo sde): las byas so/ / bai DUR+Ya'i ni shel las byas so// shel gyi ni rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni bai DUR+Ya las byas so// de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing bltan/
48a2(mdo sde): sdug la mdzes pa/ bris shing legs par bris pa/ tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis legs par bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba
48a3(mdo sde): bzhin/ rkang pa bzhag pa na ni nims shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par shes byed la/ me tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te/ de na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus
48a4(mdo sde): me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams las kyi dbang gi rkyen gyis na// sa gzhi sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldang // me tog rnying pa rnams ni/
48a5(mdo sde): 'dor bar byed// me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems// zhes kyang bya'o// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la
48a6(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ de'i glo g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing
48a7(mdo sde): dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog gi 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus
48b1(mdo sde): pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs
48b2(mdo sde): can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ / dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
48b3(mdo sde): po rnam pa bzhi yod do/ / dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa wang dang / gling bu dang
48b4(mdo sde): pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag kyang yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag
48b5(mdo sde): yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang po
48b6(mdo sde): che'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta
48b7(mdo sde): bu'i bzhon pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la zhon nas sa gzhi sna tshogs can du 'dong zhing ci bder gnas pas mngon par dga' bar byed do// de na lha'i drang srong rnams rang dgar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do//
49a1(mdo sde): bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis
49a2(mdo sde): brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ shing rta sna tshogs
49a3(mdo sde): can na ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ / khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur la/ rdzing bu rtsub 'gyur
49a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu mo rtsub par 'gyur ba rnams yod la/
49a5(mdo sde): gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang / lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur zhing sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ g.yul
49a6(mdo sde): la mos par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po rtsub 'gyur zhes bya ba yod de/
49a7(mdo sde): chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs can ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong
49b1(mdo sde): khyer gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshil zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad
49b2(mdo sde): nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par
49b3(mdo sde): bya'o/ / khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal na/ rdzing bu 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang
49b4(mdo sde): lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan 'dres pa rnams dang / lha'i bu mo 'dres pa rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed
49b5(mdo sde): mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshil na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa'i tshe yang tshol par 'dres te shin tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na/ de'i phyir
49b6(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya'o/ / skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po 'dres pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya
49b7(mdo sde): lnga bcu zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang
50a1(mdo sde): phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad sa brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du
50a2(mdo sde): dpag tshad stong yod la/ gser gyi rabs kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed
50a3(mdo sde): mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal na rdzing bu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu
50a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams dga' ba dang / lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshil du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur
50a5(mdo sde): spyod pa de'i tshe yang kun tu dga' zhing / rab tu dga' la dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal
50a6(mdo sde): gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o/ / skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag
50a7(mdo sde): tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o//
50b1(mdo sde): / bam po bzhi pa/ lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi mtshams na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ yongs 'dus brdol
50b2(mdo sde): gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu thur du zug go/ / 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya yod do// yal ga phyir gyes pa ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// yongs 'du sa brtol gyi yal ga lnga yod de/ yal ga gcig ni shar
50b3(mdo sde): phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do/ / yal ga gnyis pa ni lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga gsum pa ni nub phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga bzhi pa ni byang phyog
50b4(mdo sde): su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do/ / yal ga steng ma ni dpag tshad lnga bcur steng gi nam mkha' khyab par 'dug go// yongs 'dus brtol gyi chur dpag tshad lnga bcur yod do// sdoms su yang dpag tshad lnga
50b5(mdo sde): bcu yod do/ / mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu yod do// yongs 'dus brtol gyi dri rdzi phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar dad ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par dpag tshad lnga bcur dad ldang ngo //
50b6(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang / kha dog gis lham me ldan ne lhang nger 'dug go/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
50b7(mdo sde): kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/
51a1(mdo sde): de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol
51a2(mdo sde): 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na/ da ni ring por mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do//
51a3(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi sbal mig 'thon pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na/ da ni ring po mi
51a4(mdo sde): thogs par sbal mig bye bar 'gyur ro zhes/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du
51a5(mdo sde): sa brtol gyi sbal mig bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na// ni ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bru bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu
51a6(mdo sde): dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lharnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog la 'bus pa na/ de'i tshe sum
51a7(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na/ nga na ring po ma thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang
51b1(mdo sde): yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus
51b2(mdo sde): brtol 'di me tog kha bye ba las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus
51b3(mdo sde): kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na/ yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma
51b4(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar dad ldang ngo / / rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur dad ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan ne
51b5(mdo sde): lhang nge 'dug go/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yongs 'dus brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcur thur du zug go// 'phang du ni dpag tshad
51b6(mdo sde): brgya yod do/ / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yal ga rnams ni dpag tshad lnga bcu 'gyes so// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na/ de'i tshe
51b7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na/ da ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang
52a1(mdo sde): yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do/ / dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis
52a2(mdo sde): yongs 'dus brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na/ da ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do/
52a3(mdo sde): dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las
52a4(mdo sde): na/ da ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
52a5(mdo sde): shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi sbal mig bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na/ da ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro//
52a6(mdo sde): zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus pa na/
52a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa las na/ da ring po mi thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga'
52b1(mdo sde): bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do zhes nas/ dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha bye ba na/ de'i tshe su cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
52b2(mdo sde): kye ma yongs 'dus brdol 'di me tog kha 'bye ba las na/ da ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang
52b3(mdo sde): yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do/ / dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na/ yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab
52b4(mdo sde): ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rdzi phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar dang ldang ngo / / rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur dad ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis ldam me lhan
52b5(mdo sde): ne lhang nge 'dug go/ / shing yongs 'dus brtol thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i 'og na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te//
52b6(mdo sde): rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi mthu ni de tsam mo zhes gsungs so//
52b7(mdo sde): bar gyi sdom la/ dang po lo ma ser ba dang // de nas 'dab lhags sbal mig 'thon// sbal mig bye dang me tog 'bus// me tog kha bye thams cad rgyas// shing yongs 'dus brdol gyi drung na
53a1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi mar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb yod de/ chung dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ 'phang du dpag/
53a2(mdo sde): tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bris shing legs par bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris te/ 'jam zhing shin
53a3(mdo sde): tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'ad bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed la/ me tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub
53a4(mdo sde): pa tsam du yongs su khebs te/ de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi seng ge'i khri bzang po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do// de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
53a5(mdo sde): rnams dbyar zla ba bzhir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb kyi khor
53a6(mdo sde): khor yug na/ me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper
53a7(mdo sde): na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa 'am/ me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad
53b1(mdo sde): snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de'i nyen kor na dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang
53b2(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po
53b3(mdo sde): dang dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / 'khar rnga dang / hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag
53b4(mdo sde): yod do/ / rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu
53b5(mdo sde): de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag yod do// yang thog rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang /
53b6(mdo sde): khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / steng khang rnams dang / khyer du 'dug pa rnams dang / so so na 'dug pa rnams dang / rgyud ma rnams bud med kyi
53b7(mdo sde): tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bstan pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gi sgra snyan par sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang
54a1(mdo sde): btung ba dang ldan te/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo // sum cu rtsa gsum
54a2(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pa sa srungs kyi bu zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug la yan
54a3(mdo sde): lag bdun legs par gnas pa ste/ de'i mgo bos dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po
54a4(mdo sde): che'i rgyal pos srungs kyi bu'i srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad bdun yod do// glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs
54a5(mdo sde): kyi bu 'khor slang po che'i brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug cing / yan lag bdun shin tu legs par
54a6(mdo sde): gnas pa ste/ de dag gi mgo bo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod pa sha stag ste/ gang gi tshe sum cu
54a7(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bus mgo bo sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo re re la mche ba drug rdug/ mche ba re re la
54b1(mdo sde): rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la sil snyan
54b2(mdo sde): bdun bdun mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo de dag thams cad kyi nang na/ khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin zhon no// mgo bo lhag ma rnams la ni nye ba'i dbang po sum
54b3(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhon no/ / glang po che lhag ma rnams la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams zhon no// de shin tu 'gyogs te/ dper na 'jigs pa'i rlung ngam/ chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lha
54b4(mdo sde): 'am/ lha'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du 'di dag gi mdun du 'gro'o zhe 'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa med do// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams so sor grong
54b5(mdo sde): khyer gyi sgo nas 'thon no/ / bton nas so sor skyed mos tshal du phyin par byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang nas/ 'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung
54b6(mdo sde): ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ lha'i 'dod pa lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// ji ltar brgya byin lha'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
54b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal
55a1(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor grong khyer blta na sdug ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yang grong khyer gser ldan zhes bya'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi
55a2(mdo sde): khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris kyi khang bzangs kyang gdams pa can zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa
55a3(mdo sde): chos bzangs zhes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gyi 'dun sa yang nor bzangs zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi 'di lta ste/ shing rta sna
55a4(mdo sde): tshetshigs can dang / rtsub 'gyur tshal dang / 'dres pa'i tshal dang / dga' ba'i tshal ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi yang / 'di lta ste/ kun tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga'
55a5(mdo sde): ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba rnams yin no// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs dang / rtsub 'gyur dang / 'dres pa dang / dga' ba
55a6(mdo sde): ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po bzhi yang kun tu dga' ba ma dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ma dang / dga' ma'i kun dga' ra ba ma rnams so// sum cu rtsa gsum
55a7(mdo sde): pa'i shing yongs 'dus brtol ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi shing yang tsi tra pa ta la zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb ji lta ba de bzhin du/
55b1(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams kyi yang lha ma yin gyi rdo leb ces bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pa sa srungs kyi bu ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams
55b2(mdo sde): kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pa yang ti se'i gangs brtsegs zhes bya'o/ / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad pa rab tu brtan pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/
55b3(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyod pa yang bzod par dka' ba zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs zhes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma
55b4(mdo sde): yin rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po yang brag rdzing zhes bya'o/ / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer ji ltar 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi yang grong khyer yang 'khor dang ldan
55b5(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yin gyi rgyal srid kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ rgyas par brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs bdun pa'o//
55b6(mdo sde): sdom la/ phyed dang drug dang thang cig mtha'// thung dang grang dang 'bri ba dang // rnyog pa dang ni bsdu ba dang // phyogs dang shar phyogs 'du shes pa// zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/
55b7(mdo sde): phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad bco brgyad cha gcig tu 'dzam bu gling las yol te/ rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig
56a1(mdo sde): khyab par byed do/ / zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig tu rgya mtsho chen po las
56a2(mdo sde): yol te/ 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang / dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig khyab par byed do// zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro sde/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ nyin mo las thang cig re
56a3(mdo sde): re 'grib cing / mtshan mo las thang cig re re skye'o// zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ mtshan mo las thang cig re re 'grib cing / nyin mo las thang cig re re skye'o//
