345a4(mdo sde): cing rgya gar yul du mchis/ de'i nu bo bar ma'ang rgyal srid ma 'tshal nas ban der zhugs te/ ming ya dar ma nan da zhes btags nas/ rgya gar yul du chos slob tu mchis/ nu bo tha chung rgyal sar zhugs te/
345a5(mdo sde): ming bi dza ya dar mar btags/ rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma de dpa' zhing rtsal che bas gsod skyen dag la dga' nas phu bo ban de dar mnan da rgya gar yul na mchis pa chos mnyan bslabs bsgoms pas/ 'phags
345a6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom par gyur te/ 'phags pa dang mnan das rgya gar yul nas blta na/ nu bo rgyal po bi dza yang ra ma gsod sbyin bgyid cing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la zhen par mthong nas/ glo brje ste/ dge ba'i bshe
345a7(mdo sde): gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du rgya gar yul nas li yul du mchis te/ nyon bgyir gyi ri rtsa shel chab 'og ma/ shel chab dang nye ba zhig tu spyil bu bgyis te/ de na sgom zhing bzhugs pa las/ nyin cig gcig 'phags
345b1(mdo sde): pa de sha ba gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba gcig sprul te/ 'u then gyi sku mkhar gyi slad rol shar phyogs logs na/ 'gus no zhes bgyi ba'i sgang bu zhig mchis pa'i khar byung ba dang / rgyal po bi dza ya dar mas srog ma bar
345b2(mdo sde): gyi steng nas mthong nas/ mda' gcig 'phangs pa dang / sha ba'i brlar phog nas sha ba ni bros/ rgyal pos ni slad bzhin du bsnyegs pa dang / sha ba de 'phags pa dang ma nan da'i spyil bu'i nang du mchis pa rgyal
345b3(mdo sde): po slad bzhin du mchis pas bltas na/ spyil bu'i nang na sha ba ni cang ma mchis/ dge slong gcig brla la mangs phog pa 'byin cing mchis pa mthong nas/ phu bo lags par ni ngo ma 'tshal/ phu bo dge slong dar
345b4(mdo sde): mnan das byin gyis brlabs nas/ phu bo lags par gdong ngo tshar te/ rgyal pos btsun pa ci nongs zhes bgyis pa dang / khyod kyis bdag la mdas 'phangs te ci bya zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos kyang sha ba
345b5(mdo sde): ma lags par tshor nas/ bdag gis nongs na khri lan zhes bgyis pa dang / dge slong de'i mchid nas/ gcig tu nang khyod kyi phu bo yin/ gnyis su nang 'phags pa dgra bcom par gyur pas/ rgyal po
345b6(mdo sde): khyod kyis mtshar gyi sdig pa thob ste/ mtshams med pa dang 'dra ba'i las byas par gyur te/ bshags sbyangs dang bsod nams cher ma byas na mi rung ngo zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po de'ang 'gyod pa skyes te rab
345b7(mdo sde): du mi dga' nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de'i zhabs la 'jus te bzod par gsol/ bshags spangs bgyis nas bdag gi sdig pa 'di ji ltar byang zhes zhus pa dang / 'phags pa dang ma nan nga'i zhal nas
346a1(mdo sde): da 'phral du gzhan byar med kyis/ yul 'dro tir zhes bya ba'i gzhongs pa pi na/ sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' spang ba spod pa'i tshe/
346a2(mdo sde): rgyal po zla 'od bgyid pa'i dus na/ bram zes mgo bslangs te/ rgyal po nyid kyis mgo bcad nas bram ze la stsal ba'i 'phrin las dka' ba rnam pa gcig mdzad pa'i sa 'di yin/ gnyis su na bcom
346a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po nas li yul byin gyis rlob cing / 'ge'u to shan du gshegs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i
346a4(mdo sde): snying po dang / rik+kha ta ko sha zhes bya ba 'di byin gyis brlabs te 'di na bzhugs bzhugs/ ding sang gi bar du'ang gzugs brnyan 'di na bzhugs/ rnam pa gsum du na 'bod b+ha long zhes bya ba'i tshal chung ba
346a5(mdo sde): bina'ang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyis bcags nas/ phyis 'phags pa 'byung ba rnams kyi sgo sar byin gyis brlabs te/ gnas 'di rnams srung bar lnga 'dzin ri sha ba dang / lha mo a sho ga ka dang
346a6(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po tag sha ka dang gsum gyis dam tshig blangs/ ding sang gi bar du'ang gnas 'di srung zhing rgyal pos 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs na/ snga phyi'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis pa 'byang ngo zhes
346a7(mdo sde): bgyis pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma'ang dad pa skyes nas/ slan chad gsod skyen mi bgyid par dam bcas/ rgyal po zla 'od kyis bram ze la mgo sprin gtong du bgyis pa'i sar de ma thag tu ngog sa brtag
346b1(mdo sde): pa'i phur bu btab nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dang mnan da'i slad du 'dro tir gyi mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang chen po brtsigs/ sku mkhar gyi nang du'ang lho sgo'i sge'u chung mchis pa'i nang log
346b2(mdo sde): na/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ba ru na'i gnas kyi steng na/ pa ri tha zhes bgyi ba'i mchod rten gnyan po bzhugs pa'i drung na nang gi gtsug lag khang gcig dang / mchod rten chen po brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi nang du de
346b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sku gdung stsal/ sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi thog ma'i sku gdung ma zhig pa zhig spyan drangs te/ da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di'i nang na bzhugs/ 'gro tar gyi gtsug lag khang 'di'ang
346b4(mdo sde): gnyen zhing byin che rab ste/ ding sang gi bar du'ang mngon rtags dang mtshan ma byung / li yul thog ma ma ha shra si ka'i sde'ang dge slong 'phags pa dar ma nan da las byung nas/ 'u then na 'dro tir gtogs par
346b5(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang brgyad dang / kam sheng gtsug lag khang brgyad kyi dge 'dun yang ma hi shwa si ka'i sder gtogs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sa dza ya'i bu chen po rgyal bu 'don 'dros sang ting gi gtsug
346b6(mdo sde): lag khang rtsig par dog sa 'jal te brtsams pa las/ yo byad rgyu rkyen gyis ma 'tshal nas/ rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyis bsams pa/ gzhan nas ma 'phrogs pa/ ma brkus pa/ dkon mchog gsum
346b7(mdo sde): gyi dkor la ma 'bags pa gtsang ma bdag nyid kyis rkang gis btsugs te btsal la/ gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ thog ma rgya gar yul du mchis te/ mkhan po 'phags pa sa man ta si ri ma khan por
347a1(mdo sde): spyan drangs te phyogs phog thag tu'ang mchis nas/ nor gtsang ma btsal/ de nas slar log nas rgya yul du mchis pa dang / rgya rje'i blon po gcig gyod la chags te dgum par bgyis pa
347a2(mdo sde): las/ 'don 'dros kyis rgya rje la blon mo 'di'i basbyin par bdag dgum par ci ga nang zhes gsol ba las/ rgya rjes kyang gnang ste/ gshed mas rgyal bu la ral gris btab na bcad 'phro nas 'o ma byung ste/ ma
347a3(mdo sde): gum nas rgya rje la sogs pas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ mchod pa bgyis/ yon yang mang po zhig phul/ blon po des kyang srog rin gyi yon phal cher phul blangs nas/ slar li yul gyi 'dab nye ba zhig tu 'khor
347a4(mdo sde): mang po dang lhan cig tu mchis pa dang / rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyi nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma rgyal srid 'dzin cing mchis pa las/ blon po kha cig gi mching nas/ rgyal bu'i gcen rgyal bu 'don 'dros rgya rjes
347a5(mdo sde): li yul gyi rgyal por bskos te/ rgyal po'i rgyal srid 'phrog tu 'ongs so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma'ang phu bo 'don 'dros la mi dga' nas/ sku mkhar gyi nang du'ang ma btang / phrad du
347a6(mdo sde): 'ang ma btung nas/ sang tir gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'i sa gzhir mchi zhig ces bsgo nas/ phu bo rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyang sang ting du mchis te nu bos kyang chu dang rtswa shing la'ang dbang bskur te/ kha
347a7(mdo sde): bdag gi rin gyis 'jal te yo byad sbyor zhing mchis pa las/ phog ma rgya gar yul du mkhan po 'phags pas man tu si 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyogs su bltas nas/ phyag 'tshal te mchod pa bgyis
347b1(mdo sde): nas smon lam btab/ spyan drangs pa dang / mkhan po'ang rgya gar yul nas nam mkha' las ldings te/ li yul du rgyal po 'don 'dros kyi drung du gshegs nas/ gtsug lag khang ji ltar brtsigs
347b2(mdo sde): pa'i bshes gnyen yang bgyis/ rgyal po spun gnyis bar du ma mjal ba'i bsdums bgyi ba'i slad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam du gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems
347b3(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi yan lag dang bu spang la sogs pa sprin gtong bgyis shing / 'phrin las dka' ba ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du/ no lo zhes bgyi ba dang / zlos chos li yul du mi bgyir
347b4(mdo sde): mi rung zhes lha rnams la gsol nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams li yul sang ting bgyi bar gshegs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'phrin las dka'
347b5(mdo sde): pa ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du/ lha rnams zlos chos bgyis pa'i tshe/ rgyal po bi dza ya da ra mas blon po dang 'bangs rnams la gcig kyang der mchir mi gnang ngo zhes bgyis pa las/ lha'i rol mo bzang po snga
347b6(mdo sde): nam byung ba de thos nas mi gcig gis gcig sbran te ma bzod nas der mchis/ slad kyis rgyal po'i 'khor kun gar mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa dang / blon po dag gis rgyas kyis zhib tu bshad pa dang /
347b7(mdo sde): rgyal po bi dzi ya dang ma'ang ma bzod de/ sang tir gyi gtsug lag khang gi 'dab tu mchis pa dang / phu bo rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyis bsus nas/ spun der mjal ba dang / nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya da mas pu
348a1(mdo sde): bo la phyag bgyis nas/ pus mo btsugs/ thal mo sbya te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod kyi mthu stobs ma rig nas/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur ras/ bdag gis rab tu nongs te bzod pa
348a2(mdo sde): gsol zhing mchis na/ bdag la dngos sdig tu mi 'gyur bar bzod pa bzhes par ci gnang zhes bgyis pa dang / phu bos kyang bzod pa blangs pa dang / de slar nu bo la bzod pa gsol nas/ lag sbrel te
348a3(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang du mchis nas mchod pa bgyis/ lha klus no le bgyis pa dang / gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa las rjes su yi rang nas yon phul/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'i ngan grogs bgyis te/
348a4(mdo sde): rkyen ris bkum ste phul/ thog ma spun mjal te bzod pa gsol ba'i sar 'ja' mo ka ka rong zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs nas/ thog ma li yul du sarba sti pad kyi sde theg pa chung ngu pa'ang
348a5(mdo sde): mkhan po 'phags pas man nga si 'di las byung / gtsug lag khang gi srungs ma'ang lhaka byi la zhes bgyi bas zhal gyis bzhes te bsrung / ding sang gi bar du lo cig gcig yang / rtag tu ston zla ra ba ches
348a6(mdo sde): bdun dang brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pas 'phrin las dka' ba mdzad pa'i zlos chos no le bgyid de/ yul mi ril gyis chos nyan cing der mchis te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyen byin che bar bgyi/
348a7(mdo sde): dode'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dzaM ya dar ma'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya sing has rgyal po bgyid pa'i tshe/ ga 'jag gi rgyal pos li yul du dmag mang po drangs te/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha dang 'thabs pa las/ ga 'dzag gi dmag
348b1(mdo sde): 'pham ste/ ga 'dzag gi rgyal po'ang li rjes zhags pas zin nas dgum par bgyis pa las/ thar par gsol nas rgyal po bi dza ya sing ba'i mching nas/ rgyal po khyod bdag gis mi dbum par thar par gtang gis
348b2(mdo sde): nam khyod dgra choms pa'i dus na/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing / slar spyon cig ces bgyis nas thar par stsal te/ ming yang a nan dase nar btags te/ slar shu lig tu btang / de nas dge
348b3(mdo sde): slong a nan da se na dang / slad kyis dgra choms nas thog ma li rje dang dam bcas pa bzhin/ nam mkha' la ldings te li yul du gshegs nas/ rgyal po bi dzi ya sing ha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i
348b4(mdo sde): slad du/ li rje yang dad pa skyes nas 'phags pa dgra bcom pa a nan da se na'i slad du/ som nyi'i gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten brtsigs te gtsug lag gi srungs ma ni rnam zos kyi sras dang / lha
348b5(mdo sde): ka byi bzhugs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang mnyan zhing byin che bar bgyi/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya kir tis 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa/ kam sheng du chos spel ba'i dgra bcom pa s+ya bri zhes
348b6(mdo sde): bgyi bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas/ dad pa skyes pa'i slad du bru nyo'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ thog ma ka re ska'i rgyal po dang / gu zan gyi rgyal po dang / li rje'i rgyal po bi dza ya kir ti la sogs
348b7(mdo sde): pas rgya gar yul du dmag drangs nas/ se ked ces bgyi ba'i grong khyer phab pa'i tshe/ rgyal po bi dzi ya kir tis sha ri ras mang mo zhig rnyed pa'ang bru nye'i mchod rten de'i nang du stsal ma thog ma dog sa rtog pa'i phu
349a1(mdo sde): bu 'debs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po ba dzi ya kir ti dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa s+ya pri'i zhal nas/ phur bu 'di la rgyal pos lag pasams yar lan lnga byabs na/ mngon rtags
349a2(mdo sde): 'byung ngo zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos kyang dog sa brtags pa'i shug pa'i phur bu la lag pas lan lnga byabs pa dang / phur bu de la shug pa'i yal ga khru gang pa lnga de ma thag tu de'i nyin par skyes nas
349a3(mdo sde): slad kyis shug pa de'i drung du ban+de dag gis dar ma bklags pa dang / shug pa de las chos bshad pa'i sgra dag byung nas/ slad kyis ban+de gzhon nu dag dar ma thogs te/ chos nyan du mchis na'ang / de bzhin
349a4(mdo sde): du chos 'chad pa'i sgra dag byung ba las/ slad kyis ban+de gcig gis dang ma log par bklags nas/ 'di ltar ma yin no zhes lhas bsgo ba dang mnyan nas/ de tshun chad chos bshad pa'i sgra'ang ma byung / slad
349a5(mdo sde): kyis gtsug lag khang 'di'i chab dka' chab kyis 'tshal te/ chab ma phyin nas/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu nye ba las/ dge slong btsun pa sum pon zhes bgyi ba dgra choms su nye ba zhig gis gtsug lag khang
349a6(mdo sde): de mi zhig par bgyi ba'i slad du/ dgra bcom par 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des klur skye bar smon lam btab nas/ de ma thag tu lus las chab phyung nas/ mi'i lus ma 'phos par shes chu chung ngu'i klur gyur
349a7(mdo sde): te/ dog sa'i 'og tu nub nas/ ding sang gi bar du gtsug lag khang de'i chab/ shel chab chung ngu las drangs/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang ding sang gi bar du ma zhig ste/ gzhan zhing byin che bar
349b1(mdo sde): srungs ma'ang lha su dza ya dang / phyag brnyan sing ha su ka dang / shel chab chung ngu'i klu sum bon gyis srung / de'i tshe de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya kir ti'i bu/ rgyal po bi dzi'ang sang gra ma zhes bgyi
349b2(mdo sde): ba dpa' zhing rtsal che ba zhig byung nas/ phyi dgra mang po zhig la bsngos nas/ sems can phal cher bkum/ de'i 'og tu seng ge mi la rgol ba zhig byung ste/ dmag gis btab na'ang ma khums te/ rgyal
349b3(mdo sde): gcig pus seng ge la brgal te zin nas bkum/ de nas rgyal po de'i ming yang seng ger btags/ rgyal po de'ang ri dgas gshor du mchis pa las/ shel chab chung ngu'i 'gram tshal zhig tu dgongs
349b4(mdo sde): btab pa las/ de'i nub mo tshal de'i nang na zhugs mar 'dra ba zhig rgyang nas gda' nas/ slad de nang par bltas na/ dge slong 'phags pa dgra bcom pa gnya' na ya sha de na bzhugs pa las/ 'od byung ba
349b5(mdo sde): mthong nas dad pa skyes te mchod pa bgyis nas/ 'phags pa 'di na ci mdzad ces zhus pa dang / dgra bcom pa gnya' na ya sha'i zhal nas/ sa 'di'ang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs
349b6(mdo sde): pa lags te/ rgyal pos 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs pa'i ris so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos kyang 'phags pa de la dad pa skyes pa'i slad du/ bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan nas sdig pa bshags
349b7(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang gi dog sa brtag pa'i phur bu btab nas/ gser gyi gzhong pa gcig spyi bo la bzung ste/ da bdag gis brtsigs pa'i gtsug lag khang 'di yun du tshugs shing brtan par 'gyur na/ phyogs
350a1(mdo sde): btsun bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlab cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bdag gi gnong pa 'di'i nang du stsal bar cig nang zhes smon lam btab pa dang /
350a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' las sha ri ram mang po tsam zhig gzhong pa'i nang du gshegs nas/ rgyal po sngar bas lhag par dad pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ya sha'i slad du/ dar ma tir gyi gtsug lag khang mchod
350a3(mdo sde): rten chen po brtsigs te/ nang du sha ri ram mang po tsam zhig stsal bas/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyen zhing byin che bas/ srungs ma rnam thos kyi sras po dang / lha ka byi las srung / de nas rgyal po bi dza
350a4(mdo sde): ya da ra mas rgyal srid bzung ba man chad/ bi dza ya kir tis rgyal po bgyis pa yan chad/ rgyal po rabs bcu bzhi'i bar du res 'ga' ni yul du byi dgra gzhan gyis dam gadrangs te gtses/ res 'ga'
350a5(mdo sde): ni li rje dag gis yul gzhan dud mag drangs nas 'bangs kyi tshogs su gyur/ de'i 'og tu dru gu a ma no shod kyis li yul du dmag drangs nas 'ge'u to sha na man chad kyi gtsug lag khang phal cher mes
350a6(mdo sde): bsregs te yul dmas/ 'bangs 'gribs na sa gtsug lag khang gsar pa rtsig pa'i rngo ma thogs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya ki ra ti'i bu/ rgyal po bi dza ya sang gram zhes bgyi bas dgung lo bdun
350a7(mdo sde): lon pa zhig rgyal por zhugs nas/ slad kyis i mthar son pa dang / yul 'di sus bshig/ ci'i slad du dmas zhes dge 'dun rgan rabs dang / blon po dag la rmas pa las/ dge 'dun dang blon po
350b1(mdo sde): rnams kyang / dru gu a ma no shod la sogs pas sngon yul ji ltar bshig pa'i lo rgyus zhib tu bshad pa dang / rgyal po ba dza ya sang gra mas blon po dag la dmag tshegs ci mchis bsdus shig ces
350b2(mdo sde): bsgo nas/ sngon gtses shing yul bshig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi yul du dmag drangs te lan blan nas yul bshig/ sems can phal cher bkum/ de nas slar log nas/ shel chab 'og ma'i
350b3(mdo sde): 'gram du mchis pa dang / dge slong bdun zhig chab kyi nang du khrus bgyid cing rtsed mo sna tshogs bgyid par mthong nas/ dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa byed ces byas pa dang / dge slong de bdun yang de ma thag tu nam
350b4(mdo sde): mkha' las ldings nas/ rgyal po de la rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bcu drug bstan pa dang / rgyal po de'i yid la bdag gis sngar yang sems can mang po zhig srog bcad de bkum/ da'ang 'phags pa de rnams la ngan
350b5(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa rab tu nyes so snyam pa'i 'gyod pa cher skyes/ 'phags pa de dag gis rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa mthong nas/ dad pa'ang cher skyes te/ 'phags pa de dag ga la bzhugs pa'i drung du bsnyen
350b6(mdo sde): nas/ mchod pa dang bshags sbyangs bgyis/ bzod pa gsol nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa po nyan re sta la sogs pa 'phags pa bdun gyi phyir 'gu zhan gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ 'phags pa dgra
350b7(mdo sde): bcom pa bdun gyis kyang dogs de byin gyis brlabs nas/ zhi ba'i sa dgu zhan te zhes bgyi bar gtsug lag khang gi mtshan yang btags te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyan zhing byin cher ba ste/ lha 'dzin
351a1(mdo sde): ri shi ba dang nor bu bzang po gnyis kyis srung / de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza la sang gra ma'i bu/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha zhes bgyi bas/ rgyal por zhugs nas dge ba'i bshes
351a2(mdo sde): gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang ma ba la/ 'phags pa khyod rdzu 'phrul ci mnga' ba bdag la bstan par ci gnang zhes gsol pas/ 'phags pa des rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po bi dza la sing ha dga'
351a3(mdo sde): ldan du khrid de/ 'phags pa byam pa bzhags pa'i gnas dang / zhal bstan nas slar mchis pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha sa gzhi'i ser ma'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ dga' ldan byams
351a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa ji ltar bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs bgyis/ slad kyis byams pa la a chod pa'i slad du/ mgon po dang / lha klu gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul ci 'dra ba agon po'i rten khang
351a5(mdo sde): gcig brtsigs nas/ mgon po dang lha klu'i gzugs bgyis par dung bzhugs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyan zhing byin che bar bgyi/ lha gangs can dang 'brog gnas zhes bgyi bas srung / ding
351a6(mdo sde): sang gi bar du mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung / de nas de'i 'og tu'ang rgyal po bi dza ya pa la man chad rgyal po rabs drug gi bar du gtsug lag khang gzhan ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po'i
351a7(mdo sde): dza ya ba la zhes bya ba'i bu/ rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma zhes bgyi ba rgyal po bgyid pa'i tshe/ cu gu pan nas tshe'u pa na'i sku gzugs nam mkha' las ldings te/ li yul du gshegs pa rgyal pos mthong
351b1(mdo sde): nas dad pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas de bzhugs pa'i dri gtsang khang brtsigs/ de nas slad kyis rgyal po de'u then gyi sku mkhar gyi steng gi byang sgo'i khang na mchis pa zhig gi tshe na/ bltas na sku mkhar gyi/
351b2(mdo sde): slad rol na dge slong gcig khyim pa skye bo la phyag 'tshal te/ bka' mchid mchi ba mthong nas ngo mtshar du bzung ste/ rgyal po des blon po gcig mngags nas/ zhib tu rtog tu btang ba las/ blon po des
351b3(mdo sde): dge slong dang skya bo so sor rmas na/ dge slong de'i mchid nas khyim pa skya bo 'di ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa lags zhes mchi/ khyim pa skya bo de'i mchid nas dge slong 'di 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i/
351b4(mdo sde): sprul pa lags zhes mchi ba dang / blon po des kyang rgyal po la de bzhin du slar gsol ba dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma'ang de ma thag par 'phags pa de dag gi drung du bsnyen nas phyag 'tshal/ mchod pa bgyis
351b5(mdo sde): nas/ 'phags pa dag ga las gshegs zhes zhus pa dang / 'phags pa gnyis kyi zhal nas/ bdag cag gnyis kyang shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sem
351b6(mdo sde): can gyi don la 'dir 'ongs so zhes byung ba dang / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma'i mchid nas 'phags pa thugs rje dang ldan pa gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs
351b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing bdag la bstan par cig nang zhes gsol pa dang / de bzhin du gnang nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i zhal dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang bstan pa dang / rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
352a1(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong / nam mkha' las shing rta'i nang nas sangs rgyas mang po zhig gshegs nas/ de dag gis 'od zer btang ba rgyal po'i spyi bor reg par mthong ste/

358a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas dris pa/ gnas brtan yun ji snyed cig gi bar du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur/ des smras pa
358a2(mdo sde): bzhin bzang dag dogs pa med kyis mya ngan dang smre sngags ma 'don cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnas brtan chen po bcu drug gi lag tu dam
358a3(mdo sde): pa'i chos gtad par gyur te/ sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po'i sbyin pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la/ dge slong dag gis 'di skad
358a4(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan de dag gi mtshan yang mi 'tshal lo// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas brtan dang po'i mtshan ni ba ra dA tsa bsod
358a5(mdo sde): snyoms len zhes bya'o/ / gnas brtan gnyis pa'i mtshan ni gser bu zhes bya'o// gnas brtan gsum pa'i mtshan ni ba ra dA tsa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bzhi pa'i mtshan ni mi phyed pa zhes bya'o// gnas
358a6(mdo sde): brtan lnga pa'i mtshan ni shing shun can zhes bya'o/ / gnas brtan drug pa'i mtshan ni bzang po zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bdun pa'i mtshan ni nag po zhes bya'o// gnas brtan brkyang ba'i mtshan ni bad sa'i bu
358a7(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ / gnas brtan dgu pa'i mtshan ni ba lang skyong zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu pa'i mtshan ni lam pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gcig pa'i mtshan ni sgra gcan 'dzin ces bya'o// gnas brtan bcu/
358b1(mdo sde): gnyis pa'i mtshan ni klu sde zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gsum pa'i mtshan ni zur gyis shes zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu bzhi pa'i mtshan ni nags na gnas pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bco lnga pa'i mtshan
358b2(mdo sde): ni ma pham pa zhes bya'o/ / gnas brtan bcu drug pa'i mtshan ni gtsug gi lam zhes bya'o// gnas brtan de dag ni rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/ sde snod gsum pa/ khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba/
358b3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tshe byin gyis brlabs te bsrungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnas pa yin no// sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag rnams kyi sbyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// de skad ces
358b4(mdo sde): smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis// gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan bdag cag gis gang na bzhugs pa'ang mi 'tshal lo// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ tshe
358b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gnas brtan dang po ba ra dA tsa bsod snyoms len zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig tu ba glang spyod kyi gling na gnA so// gnas brtan gser bu zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom
358b6(mdo sde): pa lnga stong dang lhan cig byang phyogs kyi kha che'i yul na gnas so/ / gnas brtan pa ra dA tsa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa drug stong dang lhan cig shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na gnas so// gnas brtan
358b7(mdo sde): mi phyed pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa bdun stong dang lhan cig 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas so// gnas brtan shing shun zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa drug stong dang lhan cig byang gi sgra mi snyan
359a1(mdo sde): gyi gling na gnas so/ / gnas brtan bzang po zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dgu stong dang lhan cig zangs gling na gnas so// gnas brtan nag po zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor
359a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig sing ga'i gling na gnas so/ / gnas brtan bad sa'i bu zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa khri chig stong dang lhan cig pa ni sa'i gling na gnas so// gnas brtan pa lang skyong
359a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa brgyad stong dang lhan cig ri bo spos kyi ngad ldan na gnas so// gnas brtan lam pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum dang lhan cig lha rnams kyi gan
359a4(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas so/ / gnas brtan sgra gcan 'dzin ces bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig tu pri yaM ku'i gling na gnas so// gnas brtan klu'i sde zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom
359a5(mdo sde): pa stong phrag bcu gnyis dang lhan cig ri skya bo na gnas so/ / gnas brtan zur gyis shes zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum dang lhan cig ri bo ngos yangs na gnas so// gnas brtan nags
359a6(mdo sde): gnas zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu bzhi dang lhan cig lus 'phags kyi ri la gnas so// gnas brtan mi pham pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bco lnga dang lhan cig rgyal
359a7(mdo sde): po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas so/ / gnas brtan gtsug gi lam zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu drug dang lhan cig ri bo gnya' shing 'dzin na gnas so// gnas brtan de dag gis mi shes
359b1(mdo sde): pa 'am/ ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ mngon sum du ma byas pa cung zad kyang med do// dge 'dun gyi bzhes pa 'am/ sman drangs pa 'am/ bco lnga ston nam/ gtsug lag khang dbul ba 'am
359b2(mdo sde): gaN+DI'i rab gnas sam/ gang cung zad kyang mi shes pa med de/ de dag tu gnas brtan bcu drug po de dag dang / 'khor du bcas pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis der byon zhing gnas te/ de ltar sbyin pa yongs su
359b3(mdo sde): dag par byed de/ ma 'ongs pa na mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba 'das nas/ mi rnams dge ba bcu dang ldan pas tshe slar 'phel te/ de ltar lo brgya thub pa ni ston pa nyan thos de dag yang phyir la 'dzam bu gling du
359b4(mdo sde): byon nas/ dam pa'i chos yang dag par ston par byed cing rab tu 'byin par byed de/ de srid skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo drug brgya par gyur pa de srid du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos gnas
359b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo bdun brgya par gyur pa na/ nyan thos de dag gis sa'i steng 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thung pa'i bstan pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa de gcig tu bsdus nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi
359b6(mdo sde): mchod rten gcig byas te/ kun nas bskor nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la
359b7(mdo sde): 'dud pas phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod de phyag 'tshal nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod sen de'ang nu nas
360a1(mdo sde): 'og gi gser gyis gzhi gang yin pa de la gnas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos nub par gyur to// de nas de'i rjes la rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun
360a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / / de nas mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri par gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // de'i tshe 'dzam
360a3(mdo sde): bu'i gling ni 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mi dang / skye bo mang pos yongs su gang zhing bya gag 'phur ba tsam na/ grong khyer dang / grong dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang /
360a4(mdo sde): yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang yod par 'gyur ro// lan cig sa bon btab pas lan bdun gyi bar du 'bru rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i nyan thos 'dus pa lan gsum du 'gyur te/ 'dus pa dang po
360a5(mdo sde): pa ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa gsum pa la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis/
360a6(mdo sde): kyi 'dus pa chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang 'di dag ni sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag yin te/ yang de dag gis gzhan du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab la sangs rgyas las dge ba'i rtsa ba
360a7(mdo sde): bsnun cing bya ba byas par gyur pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rang bzhin dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin dang / shel gyi rang bzhin dang / rin po che'i rang bzhin dang / ra gar gyi rang
360b1(mdo sde): bzhin dang / 'khar ba'i dngos po dang / mu tig dang / lcags kyi rang bzhin dang / zangs kyi dngos po dang / tsan dan gyi dngos pa dang / a ka ru'i rang bzhin dang / dung gi rang bzhin dang / bso'i
360b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin dang / rA'i rang bzhin dang / rtswa'i rang bzhin dang / sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin dang / rus pa'i rang bzhin rnams las sku gzugs sam/ mchod rten bzhengs su gsol zhing / tha na sor
360b3(mdo sde): mo tsam gyi sku'am/ mchod rten bzhengs su gsol zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i
360b4(mdo sde): gsung rab la mi'i lus thos par rab tu thob nas/ 'dus pa dang po la ni dad pa dang ldan pas khyim nas byung nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos ni bgos nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/
360b5(mdo sde): smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan 'da' 'o// tshe dang ldan pa de dag ni re zhig sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin no// yang gang dag snang ba chos kyi phung po brgyad khri po bcom ldan 'das
360b6(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur cing / bskyed du bcug cing bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / bklags pa dang / klog tu bcug pa dang / gang zhig theg pa chen po'i
360b7(mdo sde): mdo sde phab par gyur pa/ stong pa nyid dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po dang / rgya cher rol pa dang / gser 'od dam pa dang / yon tan 'o
361a1(mdo sde): mchog dang / stong pa nyid kyi 'od mchog dang / phyag na rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / cho 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bsod nams
361a2(mdo sde): thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi ting
361a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang / byang chub bsdus pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / glang po'i rtsal dang / sprin chen dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba dang / lang+kar gshegs pa dang / yongs
361a4(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / byams pas zhus pa dang / tshangs pas zhus pa dang /
361a5(mdo sde): legs pa'i 'tshams kyis zhus pa dang / drag shul can gyis zhus pa dang / dra ba can gyis zhus pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa dang / rgyas pas zhus pa dang / brgya byin gyis
361a6(mdo sde): zhus pa dang / lag na rin chen gyis zhus pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa dang / dpa' bo'i nam mkhas zhus pa dang / bu mo 'od dang bas zhus pa dang / bu mo rin chen
361a7(mdo sde): ldan gyis zhus pa dang / bu mo gser gyi 'od mchog gis zhus pa dang / bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos zhus pa dang // gzugs can snying pos zhus pa dang
361b1(mdo sde): dge ba bzang pos gang gis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu legs pa'i 'tshams kyis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu tsan dan gyis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu rang gi rgyan gyis zhus pa dang / lag bzangs kyis zhus pa/
361b2(mdo sde): dang / seng ges zhus pa dang / seng ge rnam par rol pas zhus pa dang / dpa' sbyin gyis zhus pa dang / gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa dang / zung gi mdo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i zlos gar
361b3(mdo sde): dang / stag rna'i rtogs pa brjod pa dang / las rnam par bshad pa dang / blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa dang / blo gros rgya mtshos bstan pa dang / dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa dang
361b4(mdo sde): bden pa la 'jug pa dang / ma skyes dgra mi 'gyur ba dang / sred med kyi 'gyur ba dang / stong par 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam bu gling 'gyur ba dang / 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas
361b5(mdo sde): kyi rgyan dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / lag na ut+pa la dang / sangs rgyas bcu pa dang / chos bcu pa dang / sa bcu pa dang / 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa dang / bde ba can gyi bkod
361b6(mdo sde): pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang / tshogs kyi bkod pa dang / rnam dag me tog bsdus pa dang / 'jig rten dag pas bsdus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag par
361b7(mdo sde): bsdus pa dang / thams cad stegs las babs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las babs pa dang / rin po che'i tog dang / rin po che'i phung po dang / rin po che'i za ma tog
362a1(mdo sde): dang / mdzes pa brtsegs pa dang / rin chen skar mda' dang / rin chen sprin dang / rin chen ljon pa dang / rin chen gtsug dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / cod
362a2(mdo sde): pan dra ba can dang / sdong po bkod pa dang / 'di dag la sogs pa bye ba phrag brgya ni theg pa chen po'i sde snod yin no// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi sde snod de/ mngon pa'i sde snod dang / 'dul
362a3(mdo sde): ba'i sde snod dang / mdo sde'i sde snod do// mdo sde'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lung ring po dang / gcig las 'phros pa'i lung dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i lung dang / phra mo'i
362a4(mdo sde): khung dang ngo / / de dag la ni mdo sde'i sde snod ces bya'o// chos mngon pa'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dri ba drug pa dang / yang dag par sbyar ba bsdus pa la ni mngon pa'i sde snod ces bya'o// de
362a5(mdo sde): la 'dul ba'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi 'dul ba dang / dge slong ma'i 'dul ba dang / ma mo'i phung po dang / 'dul ba'i ma mo'i ste/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag la 'dul ba'i sde
362a6(mdo sde): snod ces bya'o/ / 'di dag ni skyes pa'i rabs te/ rtogs par brjod pa'i rabs dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rabs dang / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa dang /

362b1(mdo sde): pa gcig gsungs par gyur pa'ang / bklags par gyur pa dang / bzung bar gyur pa dang / glegs bam bris par gyur pa dang / chos smra ba la mchod par gyur pa dang / de dag dang rang sangs

362b4(mdo sde): cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la mi thob pa rab tu thob nas dad pas khyim spangs te/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas chos gos bgos te/ khyim nas khyim med par

362b6(mdo sde): sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag yin te/ dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskyed du bcug pa yin te/ 'di ltar spyan 'dren pa bsgrags pa dang / dge ba la 'dzud pa dang / brgyad ston

363a1(mdo sde): skor byed pa dang / chos sgrogs pa spyan 'dren pa dang / lo lnga ston byed pa dang / gtsug lag khang 'bul ba dang / mal stan 'dings pa dang / chos gos 'bul ba dang /
363a2(mdo sde): gaN+DI'i rab gnas byed pa dang / sman 'bul ba dang / yo byad phul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la ma thob
363a3(mdo sde): pa thob nas/ 'dus pa gsum pa la dad pas khyim spangs te/ skra dang kha spu phyi nas chos gos bgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ smon lam ji lta

363a5(mdo sde): bshad nas/ shing ta la bdun srid tsam nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas dge slong de dag gi mdun du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i cho 'phrul ya ma zung dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ steng gi nam mkha
363a6(mdo sde): la 'dug nas/ tshe'i 'du byed dang / srog gi 'du byed btang ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas dge slong de dag gis gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lus bsregs nas mchod

363b1(mdo sde): bar brgyud nas bshad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes dga' ba rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir/ rdos

363b3(mdo sde): dzi ta shI ra bA tra dang / dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur// // rgya gar skad du/ rA dza kA ny+dza bA hu dri pa s+ya pra kyi yu pra Ni d+ha sU tra/ bod skad du/ rgyal
363b4(mdo sde): po gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i lo rgyus dang smon lam gyi mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis ston pa mdzad pa'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa
363b5(mdo sde): zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa khyod sngon gyi dus na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig sprad na/ da ltar mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan te/ sku las 'od zer mtha'
363b6(mdo sde): las pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po nyon cig/ nges so so skye bo'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la
363b7(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lus la ras bal gyi le'u til mar gyi nang du bcos pa stong btsugs te/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la gtan pa med pa'i mchod par phul bas/
364a1(mdo sde): da ltar nga nyid sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya bar gyur pa yin no zhes gsung ba dang / de la rgyal po chen po shin tu yi rang ste/ de nas rgyal po des rang gi lag pa g.yas pa ras
364a2(mdo sde): ba la mar gyis btsos pas dkris te me gtang nas/ lag pa g.yon pa bar snang la brkyang ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad dgos
364a3(mdo sde): su gsol lo/ / 'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du dmigs te/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod par bsngos nas/ smon lam 'debs te 'di skad
364a4(mdo sde): do/ / mar me'i snod ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gyur cig/ snying po ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du gyur cig/ 'od kyis ni srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas/ mnar med pa'i
364a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba yan chad nas/ gzhan yang lcags ri chen po'i phyi rgyab na/ sems can rang gi las kyis sgrib pas bsgribs pa'i mun nag chen po'i nang na/ rang gi lag pa brkyang bskum yang mi
364a6(mdo sde): mthong ba'i gnas tshun chad snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ yun ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ji srid bzhugs la de srid du gnas par gyur cig/ grangs ni phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa
364a7(mdo sde): na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med par re re'i spyan lam du gsal bar gyur cig/ mar me 'di gzugs med par gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de ltar gsal ba'i mo da la gzugs med pa'i
364b1(mdo sde): lnga rnams mar me'i 'od kyis bskul ma thag tu/ mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan nas snyoms par 'jug pa'i skye mched bzhi las grol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa 'jug pa'i
364b2(mdo sde): skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di gzugs na spyod pa lha rnams kyi gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' bde rtse gcig pa nyams su myong
364b3(mdo sde): nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur cig/ mar me 'di 'dod khams kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ 'dod khams kyi lha rnams kyang / lha'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod
364b4(mdo sde): la sems ma chags shing / rang gi sems la lta zhing bsam gtan bzhi la rims kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing
364b5(mdo sde): gsal bar gyur cig/ lha ma yin gyi nga rgyal dang / khro gtum dang / sems kyi gdugs pa zhi nas tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan nas/ zhi gnas kyi sems yid la byed pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar
364b6(mdo sde): me 'di gling bzhi'i mi rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ gling bzhi'i mi rnams kyang sdug bsngal brgyad las thar nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur si// mar me 'di
364b7(mdo sde): byol song rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ byol song de dag gcig la gcig za ba dang / brdeg brdung dang / bsad pa dang / bkol ba'i sdug bsngal dang / blun rmongs las thar nas/
365a1(mdo sde): shes rab rnam pa gsum dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di ga shin rje'i 'jig rten du snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ gshin rje'i rnams gsod gcod byed pa dang / brdeg brdung gi
365a2(mdo sde): las thar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad gtong ba'i sems 'byung bar gyur cig/ mar me 'di pre ta'i gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/
365a3(mdo sde): pre ta rnams kyang bkres skom gyi sdug bsngal las thar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thugs rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ zas dang skom gyis 'phongs pa'i longs spyod zad mi
365a4(mdo sde): shes pa dang ldan zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di na rag rnams kyi gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ na rag ni sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnam par smin pas tshe grang gi
365a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba nyams su myong ba las/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal tshad med pa las thar nas bzod pa'i pha rol
365a6(mdo sde): tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'dis 'dzam bu gling gi phyi rol na mun nag gi nang na 'joms pa'i sems can rang gi nang na 'joms pa'i sems can rang gi lag pag yas pa brkyang ba'ang mi
365a7(mdo sde): mthong ba'i gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ de dag sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnam par smin pas zas dang skom 'dod pa las/ nam mkha' la rang gi lcags kyi sen mo yod pas brnyogs pas zas dang skom ma rnyed
365b1(mdo sde): nas/ rang gi lus zin pa dang sha bcad de za ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis mun nag chen po raM 'joms pa las thar nas/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye bar
365b2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ gzhan yang mar me 'di klu'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de rnams gti mug dang ser sna'i mdud pa bkrol te gtong ba'i blo dang ldan zhing / nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang /
365b3(mdo sde): me tshan bye tshan la sogs te 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar nas/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing / srog 'tsho ba'i zhi gnas kyi chu'i thig le snying la gnas nas klu rnams
365b4(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ des lto 'phye chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi nas dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phrul pa'i shugs
365b5(mdo sde): dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'dis 'dzam bu gling gi spyir gnas pa'i sa bdag dang / lha dang / klu dang / sa bdag gi rgyal po pa ti li dang / sa'i rgyal chen mo dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / mtsho bran dang
365b6(mdo sde): rdzing dang / khron pa la gnas pa dang / klung chen po dang / klung phra mo dang / chu mig dang / lu ma la gnas pa dang / gangs ri mthon po'i rgyud la gnas pa dang / ri nag po dang / gala' dang / sha srang dang /
365b7(mdo sde): spang ri dang / nags chen po dang / shing gcig pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs na gnas pa'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de dag so so'i khrul pa'i
366a1(mdo sde): rtog pa thams cad byang nas/ dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan te/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan nas thar pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ de ltar deng mar me 'di'i yon
366a2(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang / gtan pa med pa'i mchod pa 'di phul bas/ bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs
366a3(mdo sde): rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dpal mgon du gyur cig/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i smon lam gyi mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad
366a4(mdo sde): du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra tsar+ya pra ni d+ha na rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/
366a5(mdo sde): dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge kun/ bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la// lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o// bzang por spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis// rgyal ba thams cad yid
366a6(mdo sde): kyis mngon sum du/ / zhig gi rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis// rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag
366a7(mdo sde): de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus par/ / thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang bar mos// de dag bsngags pa mi zangad rgya mtsho rnams// dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab
366b1(mdo sde): brjod cing / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod// me tog dam pa 'phreng ba dam pa dang // sil snyan rnams dang byug pa gdugs mchog dang // mar me mchog dang bdug spos dam pa yis// rgyal
366b2(mdo sde): bde dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ / na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang // phye ma'i phur a ri rab mnyam pa dang // bkod pa khyad par 'phags pa'i mchog kun gyis// rgyal ba de dag kun la mchod par bgyi//
366b3(mdo sde): mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba// de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos// bzang po spod la dad pa'i stobs ngag gis// rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
366b4(mdo sde): dbang gis na/ / lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras// rang
366b5(mdo sde): rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang / / 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang // de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang // gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag/ byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags
366b6(mdo sde): brnyes/ / mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la// 'khor lo bla na med par bskor bar bskul// mya ngan 'das ston gang bzhed de dag la// 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs
366b7(mdo sde): par yang / / bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang // rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa// thams cad bdag
367a1(mdo sde): gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur// gang yang ma byon de dag rab
367a2(mdo sde): myur bar/ / bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas spyon// phyogs bcu gang+gA'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang /
367a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur// 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni// 'thun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub
367a4(mdo sde): par shog/ byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing // 'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur// tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na// rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te// bzang
367a5(mdo sde): po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing / / tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag par// rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog/ lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad// grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams
367a6(mdo sde): dang / 'gro ba kun gyi skad rnams ji tsam par// thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to// des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te// byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur// sdig pa gang rnams
367a7(mdo sde): sgrib par gyur pa dang / / de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog/ las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las// grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang // ji ltar pad+mo chus mi chags pa bzhin/
367b1(mdo sde): zla nam mkhar thogs pa med ltar sprad// zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par// ngan song sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar byed// bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun bkod cing // 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par
367b2(mdo sde): spyad/ / byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // sems can dag gi spyod dang 'thun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par gyur// bdag gi spong
367b3(mdo sde): dang mtshungs par gang spyod pa/ / de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog/ lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang // spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyod// bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i
367b4(mdo sde): grogs po dag/ bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams// de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag bdag gis nams kyang yid mi 'byung // sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams//
367b5(mdo sde): mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal bar blta// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar// de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi// rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing // byang chub spod pa kun tu snang bar
367b6(mdo sde): byed/ / bzang po spyod pa rnam par sbyong ba yang // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi// srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor ba na// bsod nams ye shes tshogs ni mi zad rnyed// thabs dang shes
367b7(mdo sde): rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang / / yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te// zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na
368a1(mdo sde): bzhugs pa la/ / byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi// de ltar ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang // skra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
368a2(mdo sde): zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / / bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis// rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji
368a3(mdo sde): bzhin dbyangs/ / sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad dag/ 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi// de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi
368a4(mdo sde): zad la/ / blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ ma 'ongs bskal par thams cad 'jug par yang // skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de
368a5(mdo sde): dag/ skad cig cha shas kyi ni zhugs par spyad// dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge dag/ de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta// rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la// sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam
368a6(mdo sde): thar stobs kyis 'jug/ gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing gi rgyan// de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon par bsgrub// de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan la
368a7(mdo sde): 'jug/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams// de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor/ mya ngan 'das pa rab tu ni mtha' ston// mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o// kun tu mur ba'i rdza
368b1(mdo sde): 'brel stobs rnams dang / / kun nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs dag dang // kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i sto rnams dang // kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs// kun tu dge ba'i bsod nams stobs
368b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / / chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs// shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis// byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed// las kyi stobs rnams yongs
368b3(mdo sde): su dag byed cing / / nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed// bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing // bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam
368b4(mdo sde): par dag byed cing / / sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par sgrol// chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byas nas// ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed// spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing // smon
368b5(mdo sde): lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed/ / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing // bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spang bar bgyi// gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yi// byang chub spyod pa'i smon
368b6(mdo sde): lam bye brag rnams/ / bzang por spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas// de kun bdag gis ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo pa// gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya// mkhas
368b7(mdo sde): pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir/ / dge ba de dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing // spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag pa// bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa
369a1(mdo sde): ci 'dra bar/ / de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog/ kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi// ma 'ongs bskal pa rnam
369a2(mdo sde): su mi skyo bar/ / de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig/ yon tan rnams kyang tshad bzung med par shog/ spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang // de dag 'phrul
369a3(mdo sde): pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi/ / nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam pa// sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te// ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa// bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de
369a4(mdo sde): tsam mo/ / gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa// rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul// lha dang mi yi bde ba'i mchog rnams kyang // zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul babs// gang
369a5(mdo sde): gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ / byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos shing // lan cig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pas ni// bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// gang gis bzang sprod smon
369a6(mdo sde): lam 'di btab pas/ / des ni ngan song thams cad sbyangs par 'gyur// des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin// snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong // de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho// mi tshe 'dir
369a7(mdo sde): yang de dag legs par 'ongs/ / kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar// de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams// gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag/
369b1(mdo sde): de yis bzang spyod smon lam 'di brjod na// myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur// ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang // rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// bdud dang mu stegs
369b2(mdo sde): mang pos de mi thug/ 'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro// song nas sems can phan phyir de 'dug ste// byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu bskor//
369b3(mdo sde): bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad 'dul// gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di// 'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog pa yi// de yi rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog la som
369b4(mdo sde): nyi ma byed cig/ 'jam dpal dpa' bos ji ltar mkhyen pa dang // kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te// de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing // dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// dus gsum gshegs
369b5(mdo sde): pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ / bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun yang // bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na// sgrib
369b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te/ mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas// bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro// der song nas ni smon lam 'di dab kyang // thams cad ma lus mngon sum 'gyur

370a1(mdo sde): rgyal bas mngon sum du/ / lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas// sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis// blo yi stobs kyis byos/
370a2(mdo sde): bcu rnams su yang // sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam ton pa yi// dge ba bcu zad bdag gis ci bsags pa// des ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams// skad
370a3(mdo sde): cig gcig la thams cad 'byor par shog/ gang yang bzang spyod smon lam ton pa yi// bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa thob pa des// 'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams// 'od dpag med pa'i
370a4(mdo sde): gnas rab thor bar shog/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai tri pra Ni d+ha na/ bod skad du/
370a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// kun dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/
