370a7(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong lha mig ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang // nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// ngan 'gro thams cad zlog bgyid cing
370b1(mdo sde): mtho ris lam ni rab ston la/ / rga shi med par 'dren mdzad pa// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na// bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar
370b2(mdo sde): mchis nas su/ / de dag bdag gis bshags par bgyi// bdag las rnam pa gsum gang yis// bsod nams tshegs ni bskyed pa de// bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon te// bdag gis byang chub mi
370b3(mdo sde): zad shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yi rang bas// de la bdag kyang yi rang ngo // sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi//
370b4(mdo sde): bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na// sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems
370b5(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub mchog/ 'tshang rgya bgyid par bskul ma 'debs// byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing // sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas// srog chag kun la sman slad du// chos kyi 'khor lo
370b6(mdo sde): skor gyur cig/ chos rnga chen po'i sgra yis ni// sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying gyur pa'i/
370b7(mdo sde): sred pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa// 'ching ba kun gyis bcings dag la// rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigs su gsol// sems kyis dri mar bgyis pa la// sangs rgyas rnams ni smod mi mdzad//
371a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs par// gang dag 'das dang ma byon pa// de dag rjes
371a2(mdo sde): su bdag slob cing / / byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig/ pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas// 'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog/ mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas// bla med byang chub reg gyur
371a3(mdo sde): cig/ ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang // rang bzhin ma mchis gnas a mchis// rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis// stong pa'i chos rnams rtogs par shog/ sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar//
371a4(mdo sde): sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis// gang zag a achis gso a achis// bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa yi// dngos po kun la mi gnas pa ra//
371a5(mdo sde): sems can kun la bde slad du// ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog/ dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas// bdag gi longs spyod lhun grub shog/ dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas// sbyin pa'i pha
371a6(mdo sde): rol phyin rdzogs shog/ khrims kyis tshul khrims skyon med cing // tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan// rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis// tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sa 'am
371a7(mdo sde): yang na me 'am chu/ / rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing // bzod pa khro ba ma mchis par// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyi// bstan spro le lo ma
371b1(mdo sde): mchis shing / / stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang // dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang // rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis//
371b2(mdo sde): bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang // dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang // rig gsum mngon sum bgyis pa yis// shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sangs
371b3(mdo sde): rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang / / 'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig/ de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing // byams bgrags
371b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yis/ / pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas// sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ gang la gnas nas thabs la mkhas
371b5(mdo sde): pas theg pa bde ba/ 'jug pa bde ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de yin no// 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam rdzogs so// /
371b6(mdo sde): bod skad du/ byang chub dam pa'i rjes su mos pa'i smon lam// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams na dus gsum gyi// ye shes yon tan thugs rje tshad
371b7(mdo sde): med cing / / dpag med lnga phung rdzogs te bla med pas// bdud kyi sde bcom legs pa drug dang ldan// mkhyen pas ji bzhin gsung bzhin de bzhin gshegs// nyon mongs dgra bcom skye dgus mchod par
372a1(mdo sde): 'os/ / yang dag rdzogs par sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen// rig pa'i blo gas la khyad par zhabs dang bcas// bzod mchog gnas su bde gshegs legs pa brnyes/
372a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di dag dngos po ji bzhin gzigs// skyes bu cis 'dul thabs kyis kha lo sgyur// srid pa'i mthar phyin lha mi ston pa'i gtso// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'di//
372a3(mdo sde): gzhal yas tshogs kyi yon tan mchog brnyes nas// don dam dbyings la mnga' mdzad chos kyi rje// srid gsum rmongs las 'khor ba'i skyon sel phyir// dbang gyur gzhan gyis rnyed min thos par dka'/
372a4(mdo sde): dka' las rnyed pa bla med dkon mchog ste// de bas sangs rgyas mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// dgongs pa lhad me snying po a do yi sde// bkri ba'i don phyir tshig bzang dbyangs kyis bsnyad// spro ba
372a5(mdo sde): bskyed ces lung bstan 'phags pa'i gsung / / don gsal bslab bder 'dra ba sdebs tshigs su bcad// yul gyi dgongs pa gzigs te ched du gzigs// gleng gzhis rgyus byas bslab pa'i dbyibs
372a6(mdo sde): rnams bstan/ / bshad pa go sla dpes mtshon rtogs pas brjod// yon tan mchog dang nyes pa'i skyon bstan phyir// sngon byung gtam dang thub pas mdzad pa'i rabs// rgyas par gsung dang mkhyen
372a7(mdo sde): pas cho 'phrul rmad/ / ji bzhin gtan la phab cing bstan pa'i sde// rnam grol khyad par bsgrubs pa lam gyi chos// mi lo zhi ba dag pa don dam dbyings// bstan pas tshang mar bsgrubs pa'i chos
372b1(mdo sde): nyid 'di/ / rab mo brtag dka' thub pas ched du gsung // sgrib sel yang dag don shes chags med blos// bla med gnas su 'degs pa'i theg chen phyir// shes rlom gzhan gyi gzhung la yod mi srid/
372b2(mdo sde): mi srid yod pa bla med dkon mchog ste// de bas chos nyid mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// ston pa mchog gi gsung las skyes pa skye// ma skyes chos nyid ston pa'i ye shes zab// bzang por spyod la
372b3(mdo sde): brtson pa'i yon tan che/ / gnyis min byer med mthong zhes ma chags blo// gzhan don gtso bor bsgrub ces snying rje'i bdag/ 'phongs la yid bzhin gtong ba'i rin chen gter// sdug bsngal na de rnams
372b4(mdo sde): gso ba'i sman pa mchog/ rgyal sras gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' dang // shes rab gsum gyi bden pa'i phyogs bsgoms te// bden mthong rims kyis nyon mongs mthar spangs nas// mya ngan
372b5(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir/ / rtogs pa'i ye shes 'jig rten gsum las 'das// dbang po rab zhi dul ba'i spyod lam mdzes// lus dang ngag yid skyon med rnam dag ces// lha min
372b6(mdo sde): yon tan khyad du mi 'khor ba'i/ / slob dang mi slob 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad// bla ma'i khyad par mthong mthu gzhan dag kyang // dam pa'i sa la 'jug pa spro ba che// dad mos dge bas 'tshe ba'i dka'
372b7(mdo sde): thub can/ / so sor thar pa'i sdom la tshul bzhin gnas// blo zab grol gnas tshul chen dge 'dun 'di// shes gsal dge bas bsgrub pa'i spyod pa zab// dad mos btul bar zhugs pa'i dka' thub brtan// /
373a1(mdo sde): yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas zhes 'dus pa'i mchog/ rnam dag spyod pas bdag gzhan don bsgrub phyir// sgrub byed gzhan gyi tshul gyis 'di ma bsnyad// bsnyad min nges par 'phagra/
373a2(mdo sde): pa'i dkon mchog ste// de bas dge 'dun mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// bsod nams gter chen legs pa bsam yas kyang // rnam dag sems kyis dang de 'ol phyogs su// bstod pa'i cha
373a3(mdo sde): tsam brjed cing phyag 'tshal nas/ / 'dus ma byas pa'i mchod pa rnam dag pas// ma byung ma skyes stong pa'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis min dbyer med rang rig snyoms pa'i yul// chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang rab
373a4(mdo sde): 'brel cing / / mtshan ma med pa'i stobs kyis grub pa yi// ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyi longs spyod kyang // thos pa'i rjes tsam yid kyis der mos te// yang dag nyid kyi snying po dag pas mchod// byang
373a5(mdo sde): chub dam pa'i spyod pa dpag yas pas/ / nyon mongs ma 'dres 'jig rten gsum la 'dren// rin chen dbyibs bkod rnam par dag pa'i zhing // 'byor pa tshad med lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzas// kun tu bzang
373a6(mdo sde): ba spyod pas thob pa yi/ / bsod nams khyad par can gyi longs spyod kyang // dad pa'i shugs kyis yang dag 'dir dmigs te// tshad med yi de bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mchod// 'jig rten dge ba'i
373a7(mdo sde): mchod pa mngon sum pa/ / me tog byug pa phye ma spos chus mchod// dri bsung mar me rol mo sil snyan dang // rgyal mtshan ba dan 'phreng ba bla re gdugs// rgyan dngan bza' gding ba rin chen dkor// sman
373b1(mdo sde): dang zhal zas yo byad mi zad pas/ / mdzes par brgyan pa'i gnas dang sa gzhir bcas// skye bo bzhon pa khyu mchog rkang gnyis ldan// legs par spyad pa'i tshogs kyis bskyed pa yi// bde 'gro skyong
373b2(mdo sde): pas 'tshe ba'i longs spyod kyang / / gus pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum 'dir dmigs te// dgos pa sna tshogs mi yul 'byor pas mchod// mchod gnas gsum la 'os pas mchod bgyis te// snying
373b3(mdo sde): rje byams ldan chags med snyoms pa'i blos/ / sbyin par 'os dang 'phongs dang mngon sum gyi// 'brel ba'i sems can kun la sbyin pa bstabs// dngos po chung lang dmigs pa cher bskyed de// gus
373b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis yang dag mchod bgyis nas/ / brtse ldan mgon med skyabs kyi mngon sum du// sngon gyi nyes pa ma lus bshags pa ni// thog ma med pa'i srid pa ji tsam nas// dngos med dngos por
373b5(mdo sde): brtags pas yid bslad de/ / ma nor bde ba rnams kyi lam ma mthong // dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan tshul ma shes// rgyu dang 'bras bur ma rtogs don nor te// lus kyi spyod pa ma dag sdig to gyis//
373b6(mdo sde): ngag gis tshig 'tshal smras pas ngan du brjod// sems kyis blo nor log par bsams pa yis// bde 'gro mtho riganas dang skye gzhan gyi// las ngan sdig pa mi 'chab 'dir bshags so// yang dag rig/
373b7(mdo sde): pa'i skal dang ldan bzhin du// dge ba'i bshes gnyen ring du bral gyur te// sdig pa'i grogs kyis rtag tu nyer bstan pas// le lo rang nyam dbang du bdag spyod cing // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la g.yengs pas na//
374a1(mdo sde): mgus nyan sems bsgom la brtson zhan te// bla med dam pa'i lam la sgrib pa yis// nan tan nyams pa mi 'chab 'dir bshags so// mtshan ma mang pos rig pa'i blo g.yengs
374a2(mdo sde): nas/ dngos med dngos por rtog cing gnyis la 'jug/ don dam yang dag mtha' la blo zhan te// mi gnas dbyings la ye shes rmugs pas na// 'khor ba'i skyon mthong sdug bsngal mi bzad ces//
374a3(mdo sde): gzhan don gtso bor bsgrub la g.yel gyur pas// bla med sangs rgyas sa la sgrib pa yi// shes rab zhan pa'i mi 'chab 'dir bshags so// ji ltar sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtser 'gyur ltar// thog
374a4(mdo sde): mar byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ / pha rol phyin bcu rnam par rdzogs mdzad cing // bsod nams ye shes dpag tu med par bsgrubs// ma 'dres stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi brnyes nas/
374a5(mdo sde): mngon par byang chub bdud kyi sde rnams btul// chos kyi 'khor lo gsung gi tshul bzhin bskor// mtha' gnyis spang phyir mi gnas mya ngan 'das// bcas pa med bzhin phun sum tshogs la sogs
374a6(mdo sde): bla med sangs rgyas yon tan dpag yas kyis/ / rgyu dang 'bras bu legs pa ji snyed pa// de dag yongs la rjes su yi rang ngo // bla ma mchod byed thos pas mi ngoms shing // shes rab gsal bsam
374a7(mdo sde): skyes chos nyid mthong / / mtha' la mi gnas sdug bsngal bzod bya ste// brtser ldan snyoms pas 'gro ba'i skyabs la brtson// sa dang pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs mdzad cing // bsod nams ye shes
374b1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa bsgrubs/ / bla med dam pa'i lam la spro ba che// rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba byang chub sems dpa' dang // blo zhib gsal bas rten 'brel rgyud bsgoms te// bskal pa brgya snyed yon tan tshogs
374b2(mdo sde): bsags pa'i/ / cho 'phrul spyod lam tshul gyis sgrol byed cing // ma bstan rkyen las rig pa'i nga rgyal dang // dad phyir bla ma'i lung bsgrubs thos 'dzin ces// gang zag chos dang dngos pos rnam brtags
374b3(mdo sde): pas/ / 'khor ba'i zug rngu skyon dag spang rigs la// mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas mchog bgrod 'os zhes// shes rab ting 'dzin blos dpyang rab bsgrubs pas// sdug bsngal ji bzhin brtags te kun
374b4(mdo sde): 'byung spangs/ / 'gog pa'i legs pa mthong ste lam rnams bsgoms// de tshul goms byas bden mthong khyad par lam// mthong dang bsgoms pa'i legs pa mi bzhin du// 'khor ba'i zug rngu skyon
374b5(mdo sde): dag yang rig la/ / mya ngan 'das pa'i bde gnas rab bsgrubs pas// dgra bcom la sogs skyes bu chen po brgyad// byang chub nyan thos rang rgyal 'phags pa'i rnams// yon tan sna tshogs brjod par
374b6(mdo sde): dka' ba yi/ / rgyu dang 'bras bu legs par ji snyed pa// de dag yongs la rjes su yi rang ngo // so so'i skye bo dge sbyong ji snyed pa// dge bcu sprad pa'i tshul bzhin nan tan gyis// mtho ris gnas dang
374b7(mdo sde): dpags pa'i sa bsgrubs pas/ / rab tu byung zhing tshangs par spyod la sogs// 'jig rten dge ba'i skye bo grangs med kyis// yon tan sna tshogs brjod par dka' ba yin// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs pa ji snyed pa
375a1(mdo sde): de dag yongs la rjes su yi rang ngo / / nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra tshad bzung dka' ba yi// rgyu dang 'bras bu mchog la yi rang nas// legs pa'i tshogs la rjes su rab mos te/
375a2(mdo sde): dad pas sems bskyed yi dam bcas pa ni// ji ltar sangs rgyas dus gsum gshegs pa yi// sngon gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams la// dad de tshul bzhin phyag 'tshal mngon par bstod//
375a3(mdo sde): rnam dag sems kyis dam pa'i rgyu byas nas// gzhal las tshogs kyi dbyings la khyab pa'i sems// 'jig rten rab 'byam kun la 'jug pa'i blos// sems can yongs la snyoms par khyab pa'i
375a4(mdo sde): yid/ bsod nams dpe mi bsgrub kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ ye shes dpag yas mngon sum grub pa'i rgyus// ston pa rdul snyed shin tu mnyes 'gyur ltar// de bzhin bdag gis dam pa'i sems bskyed
375a5(mdo sde): de/ / dad dang snying rje brtson 'grus rab brtul nas// tshul khrims rnam ngag shes rab thogs med blos// bzang po spyod pa bsgrubs te bsod nams bskang // chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam ste ye shes 'jug/
375a6(mdo sde): nam mkha'i tshad kyis gzhal te sems can bsgral// 'khor ba'i mthas gtugs 'jig rten bskyabs la sogs// byang chub chen por bya bar rigs pa dang // ma lus bdag gis bya bar dam bca' 'o//
375a7(mdo sde): bla med sems bskyed dpa ga yas dam bcas nas// dge ba ji snyed mchog tu bsngo ba ni// mchod 'os bsod nams zhing dag ma lus la// dad de mchod cing phyag 'tshal mngon par bstod// brtser ldan ma
375b1(mdo sde): chags sems kyis sbyin gsum gtong / / sdig bshags yi rang sems bskyed dam bcas nas// dge ba ji snyed byang chub snying por bsngo// ji snyed legs par spyod pa sdud pa'i rkyen// dge ba'i rtsa ba
375b2(mdo sde): ma lus kun bsngos nas/ / rtse gcig sems kyis dmigs te smon pa ni// 'dir sprad brjod pa'i bsod nams 'di nyid kyis// legs par khyad par grub pa'i rgyu byas te// rgyal po sa bdag chos kyis
375b3(mdo sde): skyong ba dang / / bdag cag 'khor bcas 'thun spyod ma lus kun// da ltar gnas pa'i lus gnas 'di la sogs// 'khor ba'i rgyun na nam bdag gnas kyi tshe// chos dang lugs kyi don rnams ci la yang
375b4(mdo sde): skyon dang bar chad gtsol ba gnod med cing / / lus dang sems bde 'byor pa yid bzhin te// snying rje byams pa sa gzhan la phan byed cing // ma skyes ma gos tshang du skye min pa'i// ngan song gsum dang
375b5(mdo sde): smad pa'i mi lus rnams/ / mtho ris skyon dang bgegs kyis sa la sogs// sdug bsngal gsungs pa'i gnas rigs gang du yang // mi skye mi myong spyod par mi 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas sku gsung rgyun du
375b6(mdo sde): mthong thos te/ / dad las tshul bzhin sdom las rig pa gsal// chos dang zang zing tshegs ldan ma chags blos// brtse phyir sprin gsum lhur byed pa na 'dogs shing // mgon dang skyabs med rten du
375b7(mdo sde): bdag gyur te/ / lha mi'i tshul du 'tsho gzhan las len// byang chub dam pa'i thabs dang blo rdzogs te// sku gsum lhun gyis grub ste sangs rgyas nas// sngon gyi dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi// sems
376a1(mdo sde): bskyed rgya chen smon lam btab pa'i mthus/ / 'jig rten bde ba can gyi gnas mchog 'dir// 'byor pa dpag yas tshad med longs spyod cing // 'od 'bar sku mchog mi g.yo bzhugs zhing
376a2(mdo sde): du/ / mtshan tsam thos pas bde gnas thob la sogs// 'jig rten khyad par phan dgu skyabs mdzad pa'i// ye shes 'od dpag med par gyur pa bzhin// khams gsum rnam par grags pa'i don grung ste//
376a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal du grub par smon// de bzhin rgyud drug lam la gnas pa yi// nyon mongs dbang gyur sems can ji snyed kun// 'khor ba'i ris na so so'i rkyen bzhin du// gtse med lus sems
376a4(mdo sde): rtag tu bde bzhin gnas/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog tu bsnyen gyur te// chos nyid dbyings la rig pa'i blo rdzogs shing // byang chub dam pa'i sems bskyed mchog grub ste// bde gshegs yang dag
376a5(mdo sde): sa la gnas par smon/ / lugs bzhin dngos bdun bdag gis 'dir smras pas// skyon med rtse gcig dam pas rab bstan pa'i// bla ma gsung gi cha tsam 'ol phyogs su// ne tso ji bzhin tshig bzlas
376a6(mdo sde): brjod mod kyis/ / rgyal ba'i yon tan la sogs dpag yas la// bdag 'dra'i blos dpags tshig 'di 'khrul srid kyis// gang nongs bla ma yongs la bzod par gsol// byang chub dam pa'i rjes su
376a7(mdo sde): mos pa'i smon lam rdzogs so/ / rgya gar skad du/ a gra tsAr+ya pra ni d+ha nAn/ bod skad du/ mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam/ sangs rgyas dang byang
376b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / skye dgu kun la sman dang bde slad du// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas rnams la 'dud// de dag la ni rjed cing mchod par bgyi// 'gro kun byang chub
376b2(mdo sde): mchog la reg gyur cig/ byams pa dang ni 'jam dpal mnga' bdag rtog/ chos kyi blo gros dpa' bo bdud rtsi gsung // dpa' bo de dag phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang mi dbang rnams la
376b3(mdo sde): 'dud/ / thugs rjer ldan zhing 'jig rten don mdzad pa'i// rgyal ba mi mkhyen mi gzigs mi mnga' ba// mi dbang thugs brtse byams la gnas pa yi// rgyal ba de kun bdag la dgongs su gsol// sngon gyi srid
376b4(mdo sde): pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis/ / sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyis bdag gis bshags// de bzhin lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// shAkya thub dang mi
376b5(mdo sde): 'khrugs 'od dpag med/ / de dag gis ni 'phrin las yongs spangs dang // 'chags dang bshags pa mkhyen cing bshags gyur ltar// de bzhin bdag gis sdig pa bshags par bgyi// thams cad dga'
376b6(mdo sde): mdzad skyes bu dam pa gang / / byang chub zhugs pa kun la gsol ba 'tshal// ngan song bzhi po myur du zhi gyur cig/ mi khom 'joms par bgyid cing rgyu bar shog/ sangs rgyas bzang spyod dri med mnga' bdag dang //
376b7(mdo sde): de bzhin lhun po'i dpal dang nyi ma sgron// de dag bsod nams yi rang mkhyen pa ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rjes yi rang // phyogs bcu dag na sbyin pa spyod pa gang // de bzhin tshul khrims ting 'dzin
377a1(mdo sde): spyod rnams dang / / shes rab sgom dang bsod nams stobs kun la// byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo // rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mtha' yas dang // chos bstan byang chub 'jog bgyid
377a2(mdo sde): thams cad la/ / byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo // 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ 'jig rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs kun la bskul// phyogs bcu dag na byang chub rnyed pa gang // de dag tshangs brgya
377a3(mdo sde): ji ltar gsol ba ltar/ / rgyal rnams bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig/ rgyal kun bskal pa mang por bzhugs par shog/ 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ mi rnams thams cad mchog dang
377a4(mdo sde): bla med pa/ / 'jig rten sgron ma bde gshegs myur gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal mchod gang dang // las dge rnams la yi rang gang lags dang // sdig pa'i las rnams bshags pa gang lags
377a5(mdo sde): dang / rgyal ba rkang gnyis dbang rnams mthong gang dang // bdag gis dge ba cung zad ci bgyis pa// lus dang ngag dang sems las byung ba'ang rung // bdag gis bgyis dang bgyid par 'gyur ba gang // thams cad skye dgu
377a6(mdo sde): sman slad stsal bar bgyi/ / ji ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnam mkhyen nas// stsal pa legs par stsal cing legs rgyas pa// de bzhin bdag gis skye dgu sman slad sprul// 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur
377a7(mdo sde): cig/ bdag gis 'gro la stsal pa gang lags pa'i// bsod nams 'bras bu tha med ci mchis pa// theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo bar bgyi// bdag la byang chub 'bras bu 'grub par shog/ mtshungs pa ma mchis
377b1(mdo sde): kun nas sgo mo rnams/ / 'gro ba'i don du bdag la mngon sum shog/ 'jam dpal gyi ni rjes su slob bgyid cing // byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam gdab par bgyi// mi gcig tsam gyi ched du'ang mnar med pa'i/
377b2(mdo sde): tshor ba thams cad bdag gis myang 'gyur bar// bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar bgyi// 'gro ba thams cad mya ngan med par shog/ sems dmyal gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal dang // dud 'gro'i gnas
377b3(mdo sde): rnams dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal dang / / mi yi gnas rnams mi yi sdug bsngal dang // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal phung po mtha' yas dag/ bdag la bab gyur 'gro ba bde bar shog/ rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing ni rnam dag
377b4(mdo sde): dang / / sems can rnam dag ye shes rnam dag dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi smon lam mtha' yas gang // smon lam de kun bdag la grub par shog/ bdag gi smon lam nyams par ma gyur cig/ bdag ni nams
377b5(mdo sde): kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur shog/ byang chub mchog ni bdag gis thob bar du// bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar shog/ mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA
377b6(mdo sde): warma dang / / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
377b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs
378a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol// gang bdag gi skye ba 'di 'am/ skye ba gzhan du khyim
378a2(mdo sde): pa'am/ rab tu byung bas ji tsam du 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal nas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyis shing bsags pa lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang
378a3(mdo sde): bgyis pa la rjes su yi rang ba shes pa 'am/ mi shes pa 'am/ bsams pa 'am/ ma bsams pa 'am/ dran pa 'am/ mi dran pa 'dod chags kyi dbang ngam/ zhe sdang gi dbang ngam/ gti
378a4(mdo sde): mug gi dbang ngam/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma lags pa dang 'brel ba'i dbang ngam/ mi shes pa'i dbang ngam/ yul gyi dbang ngam/ dus su skyes pa'i dbang ngam/ yang dag par tshul khrims 'chal
378a5(mdo sde): pa 'am/ spor bas tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ dngos pos tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam gsum dang / ngag gi rnam bzhi dang / yid kyi rnam gsum gyis sangs rgyas dang
378a6(mdo sde): chos dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon nam/ bla ma gzhan dag la nyes pa bgyis pa 'am/ sems can gyi khams lta ba log pa la btsud pa 'am/ sems can
378a7(mdo sde): yang dag sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pa 'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams log par bsngo bas yongs su bsngos pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa smras pa 'am
378b1(mdo sde): chos ma yin pa chos su bstan pa 'am/ chos chos ma yin par bstan pa 'am/ 'dul ba ma yin pa 'dul bar bstan pa 'am/ 'dul ba 'dul ba ma yin par bstan pa 'am/ lam ma yin pa lam
378b2(mdo sde): du bstan pa 'am/ lam la ma ma yin par bstan pa 'am/ sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas/ bdag mi dge ba'i chos mngon du 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i phyogs la sems yang dag par mi gnas pa
378b3(mdo sde): 'am/ sgrib pa gzhan gyis bsgribs nas/ blo g.yeng bar 'gyur ba'i nongs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad nongs pa bshags par bgyi'o// ji ltar byis pa/ ji ltar blun pa/ ji ltar mi gsal ba
378b4(mdo sde): jiltar mi mkhas pa/ ji ltar 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can/ de ltar nongs pa nongs par bshags par bgyi'o// nongs pa nongs par bshags nas/ phyis sdom pa blangs shing yang de ltar mi
378b5(mdo sde): bgyi ste/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/ gang sangs rgyas thams cad sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa rnams
378b6(mdo sde): kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang
378b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ / chos kyi dung kun nas bus/ chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad
379a1(mdo sde): chos dang 'thun par chos bsgrub pa dag la/ sems can gyi khams rab tu btsud/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu bstan cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis rang sangs rgyas rnams
379a2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyan thos rnams nyan thos nyid rtogs par 'gyur zhing / rig pa gsum dang mngon par shes pa drug rtogs par 'gyur ba dang
379a3(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa mngon du 'gyur zhing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
379a4(mdo sde): gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song nga na gro log par ltung ba la sa yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'dod chags dang /
379a5(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang / mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba
379a6(mdo sde): dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang
379a7(mdo sde): tha ma phyag gcig 'tshal ba dang / thal mo gcig sbyor ba dang / me tog gcig 'bul ba dang / sems dang ba gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su mi
379b1(mdo sde): rang ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo // gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / rab dang / phul dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong nam mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong
379b2(mdo sde): ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' ltar dag cing yongs su dag pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo //
379b3(mdo sde): gang dag gis chos thams cad yang dag par thugs su chud nas/ chos la dgos pa dang / chos la nges pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /
379b4(mdo sde): yon thams cad yongs su spong zhing yongs su sngo ba dang / chos kyi phung po stong phrag kun dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams
379b5(mdo sde): cad dang / dam bcas pa dang / smon lam dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / ston pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes pa yang dag par thugs su chud nas
379b6(mdo sde): kyang sems can gyi khams bka' blo mi bde bar mkhyen nas/ thugs khral chung ngur thugs 'jog par mdzad cing / chos ston par mi mdzad pa de dag la bdag bskul ma 'debs te/ skye bo mang po la
379b7(mdo sde): sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos bshad du gsol/
380a1(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ chos kyi dung kun nas 'bud du gsol/ chos kyi rnga brdung du gsol/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ chos dang 'thun
380a2(mdo sde): bar chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi khams rab tu dgod du gsol/ gang dag tshe la dbang ba/ sprul pa la dbang ba/ byin gyi rlabs la dbang ba/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba/ sems can 'dul ba'i
380a3(mdo sde): tshogs smin par mdzad pa dbang du gyur pa dang / dbang du ma gyur pa rnams la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar thugs gzhol zhing / skra tshe 'dor bar mdzad pa de dag la bdag gsol ba 'debs te// skye bo
380a4(mdo sde): mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du sku tshe'i 'du byed rnams
380a5(mdo sde): byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ gang bdag gis 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing bsags pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bgyis pa dang / bgyid du
380a6(mdo sde): stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /
380a7(mdo sde): tha na sems can gcig gi sems gcig gis sems dang ba gcig tsam bskyed par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems
380b1(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang / mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / dbang /
380b2(mdo sde): che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang / rdzas dang / sngags dang / sman rnyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa/
380b3(mdo sde): dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i chos grub pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / sems
380b4(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge
380b5(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob pa dang / lus las byung ba dang / sems las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba
380b6(mdo sde): thams cad 'thob pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
380b7(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang /
381a1(mdo sde): bag chags 'joms pa dang / bsnyel mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ye shes mi zad pa nyid dang /
381a2(mdo sde): shes rab mi zad pa nyid dang / spobs pa mi zad pa nyid dang / bsod nams mi zad pa nyid dang / nam mkha'i mdzod nyid dang / lag na rin po che nyid dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
381a3(mdo sde): ye shes 'thob pa dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par grub par gyur cig/ gang
381a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa de las bsod nams kyi 'bras bu yod pa gang lags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag bla na med pa yang
381a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bgyi'o// ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol bar bgyi'o// dbugs ma byin pa rnams
381a6(mdo sde): ni dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o/ / mya ngan las a 'das pa rnams mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi'o// sman pa dang bde ba'i mtha'i gnas kyi gzhi la rab tu dgod par bgyi ste/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar
381a7(mdo sde): lan gsum du'o/ / 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so// / 'phags pa
381b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das par
381b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags so// bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas
381b3(mdo sde): thams cad la gsol ba 'debs so/ / bsod nams thams cad sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// bden pa dang
381b4(mdo sde): bden pa'i tshig gis bden pa gsung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag pa ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ / bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ga
381b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa mi dge ba nyes pa byas pa dang / log par smras pa dang / ngan du bsams pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib
381b6(mdo sde): pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing g.yogs te/ kun nas dkris pa bdag nyid dang / gzhan dag gis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang
381b7(mdo sde): bzhin yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang
382a1(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / kha na ma thob med pa dang / bsten par bya ba dang / bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'drad
382a2(mdo sde): pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa mi sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing g.yogs te/ kun nas/
382a3(mdo sde): dkris pa rnams sems can 'dul ba dang / bdag 'dul ba dang / gzhan 'dul ba dang / gnyis ka 'dul ba dang / 'jam pos 'dul ba dang / khro bas 'dul ba dang / btang snyoms
382a4(mdo sde): kyis 'dul ba dang / bsdigs pas 'dul ba dang / bskrad pas 'dul ba dang / smad pas 'dul ba dang / bsten pa dang / bsnyen pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pas 'dul ba dang / chos
382a5(mdo sde): bshad pas 'dul ba dang / 'dzum bstan pas 'dul ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog gis 'dul ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pas 'dul ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul
382a6(mdo sde): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pas 'dul ba dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang /
382a7(mdo sde): gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / sgom pas 'dul ba dang / 'dul ba gang dang gang gis/ sems can gyi khoms 'dul bar 'gyur ba de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang / rdul
382b1(mdo sde): khrims kyi rgyu mi 'byung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu dang / dmigs pa'i rgyu dang / bsam gtan gyi rgyu dang / zhi gnas kyi rgyu dang / lhag mthong gi rgyu dang / mngon par shes pa'i rgyu dang
382b2(mdo sde): zag pa zad pa'i rgyu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i rgyu rnams rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa mngon
382b3(mdo sde): du mi 'gyur ba dang / snang ba skyes shing skyes pa de dag nub par 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bsnyen bkur 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / 'khor 'dod pa'i sems 'byung ba
382b4(mdo sde): dang / 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / skye bo la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnyen la rnam
382b5(mdo sde): par rtog pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / ma la stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad la rnam par rtog pa'i sems la kun nas gnas pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / gnod pa yang ba dang /
382b6(mdo sde): mdog ngan pa dang / gzugs ngan pa dang / dbang chung ba dang / rigs dma' ba dang / longs spyod chung ba dang / shes rab 'chal pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
382b7(mdo sde): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan song ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang / lus las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang / sems las byung ba'i ling mi bde ba nyams su myong ba dang
383a1(mdo sde): smon lam log pa la dga' ba dang / yang dag pa'i smon lam ma rtogs pa dang / gzhan yang sgrib pa gang dang gang gis bsgribs shing / kun nas dkris pa'i sems can
383a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis rnam par smin par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bdag la smin nas/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol zhing / rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi khams ji tsam pa dang /
383a3(mdo sde): chos kyi khams ji tsam pa dang / dge 'dun gyi khams ji tsam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ji tsam pa dang / gnyis su med pa ji tsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid ji tsam pa dang / mnyam pa nyid ji tsam pa dang /
383a4(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi khams ji tsam pa dang / 'khor bar dogs pa dang / 'dogs par 'gyur ba'i ji tsam pa de tsam du sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
383a5(mdo sde): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams gang yin pa de bdag la smin nas/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol zhing / rnam par dag par gyur cig/ bdag gis ji tsam
383a6(mdo sde): du sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing / bsags pa gang lags pa de sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// bdag ni 'dod chags la chags/ zhe sdang gis gdungs
383a7(mdo sde): gti mug gis rmongs te/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan nas/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal
383b1(mdo sde): ma mthong / ma rig ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mkhyen cing gzigs la thugs su chud pas ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// de bzhin
383b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs dang 'thun par yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ / ji ltar sems can 'dul ba dang / ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa dang / ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / ji ltar sdug bsngal
383b3(mdo sde): shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang / lam sgom pa dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spang ba dang
383b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ldan pa dang / bag chags 'joms pa dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang
383b5(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin/ bdag gis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su bsngo ba dang
383b6(mdo sde): gnyis su med pas yongs su bsngo ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ste/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o// sems can gang zhig gang
383b7(mdo sde): dang gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de'i sems rnam par rtog pa med pas/ bdag mthong bar 'gyur zhing / ji lta ji ltar sems can dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdag gis lus kyi las dang / ngag gi
384a1(mdo sde): las dang / yid kyi las rtag tu 'jug par gyur cig/ dus ji lta ba dang / yul ji lta ba dang / sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba ji lta ba de lta de ltar chos kyi dbyings 'khrugs
384a2(mdo sde): pa med par ston par gyur cig/ 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+ya kar pra b+ha dang /
384a3(mdo sde): lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ nu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban rje dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa// bod skad du/ rdo rje rgyal
384a4(mdo sde): mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten sman slad du// byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur dang da ltar gyi// rang byung rngub dbang
384a5(mdo sde): thugs rje ldan rnams la/ / bdag gis bdag kun btud nas phyag 'tshal lo// chags dang zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis ni// bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// srid pa nyam ngar sdig pa cings/
384a6(mdo sde): pa/ sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// de bzhin gshegs kyi bsod nams mdzod gang dang / byang chub sems dpa' las byung bsod nams dang // gang yang nyan thos rkyen gyi theg can dang // 'jig
384a7(mdo sde): rten bsod nams de la yi rang ngo / / byang chub snying por thog mar gang sangs rgyas// pad+ma rgyas pa'i spyan 'dra spyan mnga' ba// sangs rgyas bla med mtha' yas de dag la// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor/
384b1(mdo sde): bar bskul// phung po ma lus mya ngan 'das dbyings su// gshegs par gang bzhed mi dang lha yi lha// mgon po de dag ji snyed sman slad du// bzhugs dang sangs rgyas sku don mdzad par gsol/
384b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ba dang bshags pa'i bsod nams dang // bskul ba dang ni gsol ba btab pa dang // de bzhin yi rang bsod nams ci bsags pa// byang chub dam pa mchog tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag gis
384b3(mdo sde): bsod nams dam pa 'dis rtag tu/ / byang chub sems ni brjed par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dge ba'i bshes rnams mnyes par byed gyur cig/ mi khom
384b4(mdo sde): gnod pa brgyad po spong bar shog/ bzod dang ldan zhing mtshan gyis lus brgyan dang // rtag tu skye dran sems ni mi rmongs dang // rab des pha rol phyin pa brtson gyur cig/ dbang phyug mi brdzi chos kyi dbang/
384b5(mdo sde): phyug dang / yon tan 'byung gan nyid ni 'gyur med shog/ g.yo ga 'khor mang po 'thun par ldan pa dang // bsam pa 'thun zhing rgya cher dag gyur cig/ bsod nams mi zad rnam dag blo dang ldan// cho ga yon tan dag/
384b6(mdo sde): la dga' bar shog/ bsam gtan mngon shes so so yang dag rig/ dbang bcu dag la bdag dbang byed gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lam rdzogs pa// de dag sangs rgyas go 'phang myur
384b7(mdo sde): thob shog/ de la gang dag lam kun ma rdzogs pa// de dag tshogs kyis rnyed pa rnyed gyur cig sems can thams cad bla na med pa yi// byang chub tu ni smon lam myur 'debs shog de la dam bcas pas ni brtan gyur
385a1(mdo sde): cing / / byang chub thob min don gzhan byed ma gyur// lus kun dbang po dag pas rab rgyas shing // nad med rims nad med cing mya ngan bral// tshe ring zhi dang sgra ni yid 'ong ldan//
385a2(mdo sde): sdig las zlog cing dge la 'jug gyur cig/ ser sna bral zhing zang zing med chos kyis// rtag tu phan tshun phan 'dogs byed par shog/ gzhan du snying rje che dang ldan gyur nas// 'dod pa mi mnga' bde
385a3(mdo sde): bar gshegs gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal bying la phan bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med mchog tu// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yongs bsngo rgyal po la// des ni rang gi bsod nams yongs su bsngo
385a4(mdo sde): bde gshegs kun tu bzang dang mkhyen pa dag/ kun tu bzang po bsdod ge ji lta bar// de bzhin bdag kyang kun tu bzang spyod dang // rgyal ba dam pa kun tu bzang por shog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su
385a5(mdo sde): bsngo ba rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar skad du/ swa s+yA ya na gA tha/ bod skad du/ bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
385a6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / lha zhig nye bar 'ongs nas su// 'jig rten mgon la zhus byas te// gang gis kun tu bde legs 'gyur// bdag zhus bcom ldan bka' stsal gsol// de yi tshig de gas na gyur nas//
385a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// gang gis kun tu bde legs 'gyur// de ni lha khyod legs par nyon// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang // g.yo ba med cing rab brtan dang // gang gis tshul khrims
385b1(mdo sde): dge gyur pa/ / de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig pa dang ma dang bu// chung ma de bzhin mngag gzhug la// rtag tu rim gro legs byas pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig rag tu
385b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom la/ / yon rnams shin tu brtan byas dang // lha rnams la yang bya bsgo ba// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig lus dang ngag dang ni// yid kyis nyes pa byas med cing // gang
385b3(mdo sde): zhig gnas gsum bsdams gyur pa/ / de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la// byams pa'i sems ni rab bsgoms shing // dpag tu med la mi 'khrugs pa// de la
385b4(mdo sde): kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ / sdug bsngal thams cad spang ba'i phyir// bde ba 'thob byed 'phags pa'i lam// yan lag brgyad pa sus bsgoms pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// 'du byed
385b5(mdo sde): thams cad stong nyid du/ / gang gis rtag tu rab mthong zhing // der yang sems can gnas gyur pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang dag dri ma med chos rnams// lus kyis mngon sum byas nas spang
385b6(mdo sde): dgra bcom rnam par grol sems rnams/ / de dag rtag tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang // shes pa mi 'jigs skyes gyur pa// de la
385b7(mdo sde): kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgon// yang srid zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// gang la khong du chud mdzad pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// bde legs su
386a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su le nang po dz+ha dang / su chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgrud cing zhus teg/
386a2(mdo sde): la bab pa// rgya gar skad du/ swasti g+hA tha/ bod skad du/ bde legs kyi tshog su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha zhig te
386a3(mdo sde): bar 'ongs nas su/ / lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te// sangs rgyas chen po thub pa chen// ci zhig smras na bde legs 'gyur// lha yi tshig de gsan gyur nas// 'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa
386a4(mdo sde): gang gis rtag tu rjod byed la/ / nga yi bde legs 'gyur de nyon// 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mtho ris na// rin chen rgya chen mchog na gang yod pa// de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la//

386a7(mdo sde): na phyin chad mya ngan med/ / ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyis rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs
386b1(mdo sde): shog/ rgyal bas gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa// de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste// sprin gnas de dag sa steng shin tu dkon// de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur// ngo mtshar

386b5(mdo sde): yas blo ldan de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa/ / ting 'dzin de brtan rdo rje dper byas pa// ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// ting nge
386b6(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ ji ltar sgo gtan brtan zhing rab dam ste// stobs chen

387a1(mdo sde): chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad

388a6(mdo sde): ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba// mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i bkra shis pa// dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang
388a7(mdo sde): yin pa/ / bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ yon tan sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad pa// yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi bslu ba// rin chen 'byung gnas zhes
388b1(mdo sde): bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ / bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ bsam gtan ting 'dzin dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing // tshe grangs med
388b2(mdo sde): par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang+gA/ / bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sems can don gyi las la thugs ni spor mdzad cing // 'gro ba kun gyi 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa//
388b3(mdo sde): thub mchog don yod grub kyi bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// /

389a1(mdo sde): rgyan btags gang / / bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog// gzhon nu'i stobs ni sgyu rtsal yig rtsis 'phong las ni/ kun las mthar byung lha mi la sogs kun pas mchog
389a2(mdo sde): shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs log rtog bsal phyir btsun mo'i 'khor/ / bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ pho brang nas byung rga nad 'chi ba las byung gzigs/ mi rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags ngur

389b5(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa/ / deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ rgyal ba thams cad slob pa'i rgyal rigs blo gros can// tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du// shing mchog sA la'i shing
389b6(mdo sde): / drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni stobs ldan bram ze'i rigs// tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du/ shi ri shi yi
389b7(mdo sde): shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ / deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rig/ tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/
390a1(mdo sde): u dum wa ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ skyob pa 'od srungs rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can// tshe lo
390a2(mdo sde): khri'i dus na grong khyer wA ra Na si ru/ / n+ya gro d+ha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can//
390a3(mdo sde): tshe lo brgya pa'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du// a shwat+tha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs pa mnga' dbang gser gyiri bo
390a4(mdo sde): 'dra/ / 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba// bkra shis des ni skye dgu'i zhi byed dang po'o// de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi
390a5(mdo sde): g.yo ba/ / 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa// chos mchog dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i
390a6(mdo sde): bkra shis phyug/ mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas// tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi zhing // 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// che ba'i tshe mchog ston
390a7(mdo sde): mchog bla na med/ / chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// bgegs dang bdud ris gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste/ rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog than
390b1(mdo sde): med/ / dam chos bdud rtsi'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste/ rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal
390b2(mdo sde): 'bar ba/ / rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyes pa'i skyon zhi dge tshogs rnam par 'phel// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang srungs
390b3(mdo sde): ma'i byin rlabs kyis/ / phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te// bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin grub pa dang // tshe ring nang med bde skyid ldan par shog/
390b4(mdo sde): oM swa sti/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas gtso la yon tan mchog mnga' zhing // che dgus mchod cing smon lam sprin tshogs 'dus// go 'phang ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs pa/
390b5(mdo sde): bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs mnga' zhing // shin tu phan dang bde dang nges gsung ba// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan med 'thob pa'i// bkra shis des
390b6(mdo sde): kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dge 'dun che la mthu rtsal rmad mnga' zhing // bslang gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor can// bdag gzhan don chen sgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa// bkra shis des kyang
390b7(mdo sde): skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun// bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te// bsod nams ye shes las byung ba// dam pa gnyis ni thob par shog/ sems can thams cad ma lus
391a1(mdo sde): pa/ sa rab dga' ba thob par du// rtag tu tshe rabs dran pa dang // rab tu 'byung ba thob par shog/ bkra shis par gyur cig//
391a2(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ rat+na tra ya swas+t+ri ga bA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gtso
391a3(mdo sde): la yon tan mchog mnga' ba/ / tshe dgus mchod cing smon lam sprin tshogs 'dus// go 'phang mchog brnyes bstod pa'i char 'bab pa'i// bkra shis dam pa des 'dir bde legs shog/ skyob
391a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs mnga' ba/ / shin tu phan dang bde dang nges gsung ba// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan 'das thob pa'i// bkra shis dam pa des 'dir bde legs shog/ dge
391a5(mdo sde): 'dun che la mthu dpal rmad mnga' ba/ / bslab gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor can// bdag gzhan don chen bsgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa'i// bkra shes dam pa des 'dir
391a6(mdo sde): bde legs shog/ lo brgya 'tsho zhing ston brgya mthong ba dang // tshe ring ba dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // theg pa mchog gis nges par 'byung 'gyur ba// lnga po 'dis/
391a7(mdo sde): kyang bdag la srung gyur cig/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
391b1(mdo sde): 'dir smras pa/ ma spang rtsing stobs do mas// tshang ldan 'gro bkrol bar nam 'gyis 'ang // rnam 'dren song ga dngas
391b2(mdo sde): pad dkar ltar/ / yongs bsngags ston mchog zas gtsang sras po yis// mi 'jigs dam bca' bzhi ldan seng+ge'i sgra// chos tshul rgya mtsho'i gdangs su nyer 'khrol
391b3(mdo sde): ba/ / gangs can yi ge'i gzugs su legs 'phos pa'i// glegs bam brgyaphrag gcig dang dgu yi grangs// ris med 'gro la phan bde'i gsos sman du//
391b4(mdo sde): ci dgar 'gyed slad dag gsal dpar gyi 'phrul// bskrun pa'i rnam dkar 'dis mtshon du sa gsum du// bsags pa'i dge tshogs zla gzhon 'bum 'dra des// ris med thub bstan
391b5(mdo sde): dpag bsam yongs 'du'i shing / / bshad dang sgrub pa'i yal ga phyogs kyi mthar// yongs khyab gtan bde'i grib bsil rtag 'bebs pas// 'gro kun ngal gso'i dbugs dbyungs
391b6(mdo sde): thob par shog/ mkhas dang grub pa'i bstan 'dzin skyes mchog kun// zhabs zung g.yung drung ngo bor lhun chags shing // gzhan phan 'phrin las nyin byed stong gi gzi// rnam par grol
391b7(mdo sde): ba'i dge mtshan rab gsal shog/ bslab gsum sbrang rtsi'i bcud kyis rab gtams pa'i// shAkya'i sras po rig grol 'dab brgya'i tshal// klog spong ge sar dgod pa'i so phreng gi
392a1(mdo sde): dzum dkar 'dzam gling rgyan du rtag mdzes shog/ yangs pa'i 'jig rten khyon du bde legs kyi// rdzogs ldan dpyid kyi dpal yon sdug gum// phun tshogs sde bzhi'i lang tshor rab dar ba'i//
392a2(mdo sde): ngo mtshar kun dge'i dus ston yongs khyab shog/ tshul 'dir 'bad pa'i dge tshogs nyal 'gro'i rgyun// rgyal sras smon pa'i chu klung 'bum phrag dang // lhan cig byang chen rgya mtshor rab
392a3(mdo sde): gzhol te/ / khams gsum srid pa'i gdung ba kun sel shog// ces pa 'di yang sngon la dwags rgyal po nyi ma rnam rgyal gyi dus su rgyal po'i bka' bzhin bka' blon bsod nams lhun
392a4(mdo sde): grub kyis dbus phyogs lho po 'brug bstan chos slong nas rgyal ba'i bka' 'gyur rin po che gdan drangs shing / de la ma dper byas te bka' 'gyur pod grangs brgya dang dgu byas pa zhig gsar
392a5(mdo sde): bzhengs mdzad pa de bzhin bka' 'gyur dpar gsar khag gzhan dang chos tshan bsgrigs stangs dang / brda gsar rnying sogs tshig sna mi 'dra ba dang / bod kyi grangs tha dad lta bur 'dug pa
392a6(mdo sde): der phyi mi mkhas pa 'ga' zhig gis do snang ci che byed bzhin par brten bstan rgyun la'ang phan rlabs che bar mthong ste/ ma dpe'i bdag po la dwags rgyal po kun bzang rnam rgyal mchog dang /
392a7(mdo sde): rgyal mo bde skyid dbang mo rnam gnyis la snyan bskul zhus don ltar ma dpe bris ma bris tshugs spus legs 'di nyid g.yar po skyabs 'jug don smin son pa bzhin/ la dwags ta ru gser
392b1(mdo sde): mgar pa tshe brtan rnam rgyal bas byi lo lor 'gro 'dzugs zhus te de lam phyi lo/ 18tham pa'i lor mjug rdzogs par dpar
392b2(mdo sde): bstan bgyis pa'i dge tshogs byang chen gyi rgyur smin phyir sgron tshig 'di 'dra zhig brtsams dgos zhes bskul bltar/ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri byang sbrul ming bro bzang ye shes bstan
